last_episode_to_air.name: Run for Shelter
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jack is playing with his toy soldiers. Fed up with his cousin's stupid childish games, Oggy tells him he should go play outside. A Remastering of "Take Cover"

name: Oggy and the Cockroaches
overview: Oggy, an anthropomorphic cat, would prefer to spend his days watching television and eating, but is continuously pestered by three roaches: Joey, Marky and Dee Dee. The cockroaches' slapstick mischief ranges from plundering Oggy's refrigerator to hijacking the train he just boarded. In many situations Oggy is also helped by Jack, who is more violent and short-tempered than him and is also annoyed by the cockroaches. Bob, a short-tempered bulldog, also appears in the show, and is Oggy's neighbor.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Try as he might, there's no rest for Oggy. The blue cat travels to Egypt, gets some fancy new jobs and even takes an unplanned trip to the moon.

tagline: Cats vs Cockroaches, who do you think will win?

episodes.name: Bitter Chocolate
episodes.overview: Oggy gets a box of cherry-chocolates delivered to his home and goes inside to enjoy them. However, the roaches - Joey, Marky and Dee Dee have decided to take it for themselves, and a chase begins throughout the house. Jack nurses Oggy and vows to get back the box of sweets, even if it involves blowing up the house.

episodes.name: It's All Under Control
episodes.overview: During an afternoon, Jack is snoozing on his hammock while Oggy is tending the garden. The cockroaches jump into Jack's head so that they can control him to wreak havoc on Oggy.

episodes.name: The Lottery Ticket
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack won the lottery ticket number for a massive sum of money, but the cockroaches want the lottery ticket for the much-needed money as well.

episodes.name: The Time Machine
episodes.overview: Poor Oggy, as usual, gets in an accident involving Jack against the cockroaches in retaliation of his cake being eaten, ending up being squashed into a disk. To make sure he'll never repeat that mistake twice, Jack builds a time machine to go back in time and prevent the accident. Unfortunately for him, turning forward - and back - the clock may yield unwanted results.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Babies
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack, after eradicating the cockroaches from their house, receive 3 baby kittens that look like Jack - little do they knew and suspect that these bundles of joy are actually the roaches in disguise, obviously in retaliation for being kicked out of the house.

episodes.name: So Lonely
episodes.overview: Oggy finally manages to remove the cockroaches out of his home permanently, but gradually regrets doing so, as he starts to miss them, leading to a severe tantrum.

episodes.name: Baby Doll
episodes.overview: Oggy is playing with his doll and its included playhouse. The cockroaches, however, have taken the playhouse for themselves and when Marky spots the doll, he falls in love with it. This results in Oggy making an all-out siege on the playhouse to take back what's rightfully his.

episodes.name: A Tip for the Road
episodes.overview: Oggy, in order to get his driver's license, takes driving lessons with the driving instructor. The cockroaches, of course, try their best to shift the chaos into turbo.

episodes.name: A Dog Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: Oggy arrives at home after shopping and trips over a small pup. He takes it inside and start pinching his own nose as a squeezing toy to play with the pup. When Jack arrives he, of course, begins to think that Oggy has gone crazy as Jack and the pup are not seen simultaneously.

episodes.name: It's a Long Way Down
episodes.overview: While Jack takes up mountain climbing, Oggy intends on reading a good book from his library, only to end up getting stranded in some very high book shelves by the cockroaches, while Jack is having problems of his own at the mountain. Looks like it's going to be a real long way down for both of our feline friends...

episodes.name: Bugball
episodes.overview: Oggy gets his hands on a new, super bouncing-ball. He decides to try it out and it soon bounces all over the house, wrecking everything in its path. And things don't get any better when Joey accidentally swallows it.

episodes.name: Emergency Room
episodes.overview: Oggy was sent to the hospital when he tripped over down the stairs in pursuit while Jack watched over him. Unfortunately for him, the cockroaches decide to take a visit to the hospital - just to make an already bad situation worse for Oggy.

episodes.name: Occupied
episodes.overview: Oggy desperately needs to use the bathroom, but the cockroaches have it occupied and do all what they can to keep him out.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Magic Broom
episodes.overview: A wizard quietly sleeps over at Oggy's house for the duration of the day. Meanwhile, the cockroaches fight over the usage of his flying broom against Oggy.

episodes.name: The Dictator
episodes.overview: While helping to catch the cockroaches, Jack starts acting like a ruthless, superior-minded Dictator to Oggy, reducing him to a downtrodden proletariat - an action he will live and come to regret, as that will evolve into a struggle between control and freedom...

episodes.name: Duck Soup
episodes.overview: Jack and Oggy were making and preparing Duck Soup for their dinner, with the main ingredient being the duck itself – until a lot of its angry, protesting friends show up.

episodes.name: The Piggy Bank
episodes.overview: Oggy puts a solid padlock on the fridge to stop the cockroaches pesky behaviour.

episodes.name: The Rise and the Fall
episodes.overview: Jack is building a skyscraper in Oggy's back garden. However, when helping in the making of this building, Oggy experiences a complete acrophobia until Jack helps to get him to sleep. But the problems are just getting started. Oggy is sleepwalking, and to make matters worse, the cockroaches are around to sabotage the skyscraper at all costs.

episodes.name: Deep End
episodes.overview: Taking a simple bath soon escalates into a desperate struggle for Oggy when the cockroaches sabotage it, especially when our blue feline can't swim and has a severe case of hydrophobia. Can Jack help him overcome this seaborne problem?

episodes.name: It's a Small World
episodes.overview: Using a photocopier, Oggy shrinks himself down to the cockroaches' size in order to infiltrate their home and take back the key to his padlocked fridge.

episodes.name: Jealousy
episodes.overview: Oggy invites his date over to his house for dinner. However, he starts to get jealous when cockroach Marky falls in love with her. And soon, this jealousy will escalate a brawl...

episodes.name: Go Slow With Your Dough
episodes.overview: Jack has to pay a debt. He brings into Oggy's house a suitcase full of money, for Oggy to look after it. And Oggy becomes paranoid knowing that all that money is in his house.

episodes.name: Tooth Good to be True
episodes.overview: After witnessing Oggy receive money from the tooth fairy, Joey plans on getting some himself. He is unwilling to give this up, even if this means losing all of his teeth in the process.

episodes.name: One Track Life
episodes.overview: While Jack is hooked on video games, Oggy tries to pass the time by playing with a train set. However, when the cockroaches come aboard, he soon becomes a part of their roller coaster.

episodes.name: The Carnival's in Town
episodes.overview: The carnival has come to town, and Oggy and Jack are more than happy to go into it. Unfortunately, the cockroaches also decide to go the carnival, just to have massive fun wreaking havoc all over the place...

episodes.name: Mouseagator
episodes.overview: After seeing Oggy's new remote-controlled lawnmower, the cockroaches forge their own cat-destroyer machine that looks like a mouse, but acts like an alligator.

episodes.name: Nine Months and Counting
episodes.overview: The cockroaches' latest prank on Oggy has them inflating his stomach, making him think that he's pregnant. However, he'll soon find out that only girls can have babies, and not boys...

episodes.name: Oggy and the Magic Flute
episodes.overview: After seeing a snake charmer on TV, Oggy decides to make his own flute, in which he steals a car part from his neighbour Bob. Upon adding holes to it, Oggy plays it and unwittingly hypnotises cockroach Marky into being a dog that would remain loyal to him, much to the dismay of cockroaches Dee Dee and Joey.

episodes.name: 3 Wishes and Your Out
episodes.overview: A bedouin, who is lost and parched in as desert, finds a magic lamp. He uses his three wishes to get a palace, a pile of gold and lovely girls - but he forgets to wish for water. The genie flees after being attacked by the infuriated bedouin and of course, ends up in Oggy's house.

episodes.name: Virtual Voyage
episodes.overview: It's all out Cyberspace War as Oggy, with his vacuum cleaner, and Joey takes the daring voyage in the internet in order to return to the real world - however, system errors, bugs, power flows and even Jack himself are hellbent on slowing Oggy and Joey down...

episodes.name: Granny's Day
episodes.overview: Oggy's granny comes to visit. It's her birthday and what she wants is three dead cockroaches.

episodes.name: Beachcombers
episodes.overview: Oggy is going to the beach for what he thinks will be a relaxing day off. What he doesn't notice, is that the cockroaches has decided to tag along. And when Oggy and the cockroaches are near each other, trouble is bound to happen.

episodes.name: Heatwave
episodes.overview: The cockroaches fight Oggy over getting a sun tan. Their main scheme this time has them in a tire-made hot-air balloon under the guise of a rain cloud.

episodes.name: Oggy's Clone
episodes.overview: The cockroaches play a hit-and-run prank where they frame Oggy by dressing up as him and attacking Jack.

episodes.name: Race to the Finish
episodes.overview: Jack bought Oggy a remote control car and they want to race with them, but then the cars are now annoyances and chasing - and chased by - the cockroaches to run them all over.

episodes.name: Mission Oggy
episodes.overview: After getting himself trapped in a drink bottle, cockroach Dee Dee is kidnapped by Oggy and locked up in the fridge. Upon seeing this, Marky and Joey attempt to get past Oggy's newly installed defences and save their fellow roach by all means, at all costs.

episodes.name: Blue Sunday
episodes.overview: Jack takes Oggy on a Sunday trip with the beach as the destination. The cockroaches decide to tag along. But trouble is always around the corner when the cockroaches are placed in a small space (Jack's car in this case) together with the two cats.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: After consuming a piece of irradiated chocolate (obviously placed in the box by the cockroaches), Oggy transmutates into a cockroach himself! How will Jack react to this?

episodes.name: The Hiccup
episodes.overview: What started out as a sip from a simple cup of coffee turns into intensely strong hiccups for Oggy. And while attempting to steal his fridge, the cockroaches get involved with his situation.

episodes.name: Globulopolis
episodes.overview: Dee Dee is just swimming on Oggy's yogurt, when, unknown to him, Oggy drinks it up, and Dee Dee along with it. Dee Dee then travels around Oggy's insides and decides to give Oggy the mother of all indigestions.

episodes.name: House for Rent
episodes.overview: The cockroaches rent Oggy's house to a redneck who kicks Oggy out. In trying to get his house back, Oggy finally rents it out to a wrestler who is even worse.

episodes.name: Fishing Frolic
episodes.overview: Jack takes Oggy on a fishing trip, with neither of them knowing that cockroach Dee Dee has come along with them. While Jack keeps a large fish at bay, Oggy is learning how to fish whereas Dee Dee is eating all of the bait.

episodes.name: Space Roaches
episodes.overview: Three alien cockroaches from another world (obviously genetically resembling Dee Dee, Marky and Joey) visit Oggy's household. They constantly shape-shift Oggy and Jack into different objects and share good moments with the regular cockroaches.

episodes.name: It's Been a Hard Days Noise
episodes.overview: Oggy wants to listen to his music CD in peace, but the cockroaches decide to pump up the volume into and beyond acceptable limits.

episodes.name: Rock 'n Roll Altitude
episodes.overview: Oggy has a fear of flying, and while taking him on a flight, Jack tries hypnosis to help him relax. However, while a relaxed Oggy has gone walkabout around the plane, the cockroaches have come aboard as well, in which they leave all of the pilots tied up and gagged in order for them to cause the usual sabotage.

episodes.name: Oggy's Night Out
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack have a meal out at a fancy restaurant. Unfortunately, things take an unexpected and a real bad turn, as the cockroaches are stealing their orders and Jack can't wait any longer to tuck in.

episodes.name: TV Obsession
episodes.overview: Oggy is hooked onto his favourite TV program. However, this doesn't stop the cockroaches from having fun, by locking his TV in a safe.

episodes.name: Abominable Snow Moth
episodes.overview: Things go upside down in the winter when the abominable snow moth came into and eats any yarn in its path in Oggy's home. How would Oggy respond to this cotton-involving incident?

episodes.name: Docu-Mentally
episodes.overview: Oggy gets a video camera in the mail and attempts to film the cockroaches' final demise. However, just as he could get to watching the end of it, the roaches decide to get their ultimate revenge by stealing his tape and recording him in the most humiliating way possible.

episodes.name: Bait Bites Back
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack were going fishing but Oggy try to catch the cockroaches as baits - and these baits sure can bite back!

episodes.name: Cat Kit
episodes.overview: Jack arrives with a put-it-together-yourself roach-catching trap. When he tries to get some silence to work, the cockroaches try their best in causing as much noise as possible. This forces poor Oggy to try and keep them quiet, which is easier said than done.

episodes.name: A Bird of Ill Omen
episodes.overview: Oggy is minding his own business, watering his flowers when a turkey comes running and hides behind his back. Shortly after, a visually impaired hunter appears from the hedge. The hunter has a problem, and so is for Oggy: because of his poor eyesight, turkeys looks like Oggy to him and Oggy looks vice-versa.

episodes.name: Memory Lane
episodes.overview: Oggy finds some old love letters from a girl he used to go to school with. However, the cockroaches play a more rotten than usual prank, which involves faking a date and replacing Oggy's deodorant with insect repellent that stinks so badly.

episodes.name: A Truce for Christmas
episodes.overview: The cockroaches are planning on ruining Oggy's Christmas but after they are thrown outside, Oggy makes a truce between them. Meanwhile, Jack must survive a huge snow storm to get to Oggy's house for Chrismtas.

episodes.name: The Patient
episodes.overview: Jack ends up frozen in a block of ice while chasing the cockroaches so Oggy nurses him. Unfortunately the cockroaches have changed Jack's medicine for an evil concoction of their own.

episodes.name: The Neighbor's Cat
episodes.overview: The fat neighbor woman treated Oggy as a pet cat when the real neighbor's cat made it happen - and the cockroaches want Oggy stay that way by all means.

episodes.name: Monster from the Mud Lagoon
episodes.overview: Oggy watched a scary movie about a Monster from the Mud lagoon while Jack tripped over a mud and Oggy believed Jack is really the monster. The cockroaches try all what they have in their sleeves to intensify Oggy's fear of Jack.

episodes.name: The Wrong Side of the Bed
episodes.overview: Superstitious Oggy finds out that today is Friday the 13th, and starts acting paranoid. And as always, the cockroaches are willing to take full advantage of his dilemma.

episodes.name: Honeymoon
episodes.overview: While Oggy was eating honey or jam, it brings along an old bee woman which cockroach Joey is in love with, starting up a literal honeymoon - involving irritating Oggy.

episodes.name: French Fries
episodes.overview: After making some french fries, Oggy intends on having a well-deserved snack... that is, if he can take them back from the cockroaches first.

episodes.name: Oggy vs. Super Roach
episodes.overview: While repairing the roaches' TV in one stormy night, Dee Dee is struck by lightning, which gives him superhuman strength. However, Dee Dee lets this get to his head, causing him to be a bully toward Oggy and even to his fellow roaches, Marky and Joey.

episodes.name: Oggy Van Winkle
episodes.overview: The cockroaches receive a zapping from Oggy's newly found Chronofreezer gun. They eventually wake up (thanks to a poodle marking its territory on them) in the future where they see Oggy and Jack at a very old age. The cockroaches decide to take advantage of this, which results in a chaotic fight the future has never seen before.

episodes.name: Beware Of Destruction
episodes.overview: Jack is renovating Oggy's house and when the cockroaches steal his cement tray to use it as a swimming pool. Unfortunately, Jack ends up as a statue when the cockroaches put cement in his drink. Worse yet, they are about to take full advantage of his severe disadvantage.

episodes.name: Shake Oggy Shake
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack were washing clothes and dishes for chores but, for obvious reasons, the cockroaches crank Oggy's coffee up QUITE a notch as to make Oggy do everything very fast.

episodes.name: The Ghost Hunter
episodes.overview: After Oggy finishes them off once and for all with a frying pan, the cockroaches come back as ghosts and constantly make nightmares a reality for poor old Oggy. Will Oggy be able to put down this paranormal paranoia he has created, and how will he do it - or is it all over for his sanity?

episodes.name: Caught in a Trap
episodes.overview: Oggy wakes up and finds his house completely messed up. The cockroaches have yet again plundered his fridge and caused a mess which makes Oggy's eyes pop out of his head. He is now forced to protect the fridge as best as he can.

episodes.name: Winner Takes All
episodes.overview: Conflict begins between Oggy and Jack after cockroach Joey sabotages a game of chess just by stealing one of the pieces.

episodes.name: Oggy's Diet
episodes.overview: Overweight Oggy decides to keep fit, much to the dismay of the cockroaches. What can those pests do to this situation? By performing the usual sabotages to make sure Oggy stays the way he is.

episodes.name: The Garden of Horrors
episodes.overview: Oggy was just minding his business, gardening the grass while the cockroaches made it worse by making them bigger.

episodes.name: Cloning Around
episodes.overview: Jack is tired of the weak, useless Toxins in the Insecticide. He decides to enhance it by using his new Chemistry Set. The result is... a Gas that has the ability to clone the subject it used on.

episodes.name: A Night at the Opera
episodes.overview: Jack is now a tenor and is making a performance at the opera. Dee Dee wishes to join in and tries to team up with him. Jack, however, tosses Dee Dee in a trashcan as his way of saying "no". But it will take more than that to break Dee Dee's dream, as he is trying to ruin the performance and take it all for himself.

episodes.name: Toys R Oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy has found a lot of new toys for him to play with during Christmas Eve, but when an extended boxing glove punched Jack, his brain was knocked out of him and the cockroaches use it as a toy - and an initiative to make the holiday matters for Oggy worse.

episodes.name: Loony Balloons
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack share a ride in a remote-controlled hot-air balloon. However, it soon becomes a joyride when their remote ends up in the cockroaches' hands.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Giant Roaches
episodes.overview: Oggy believes he's seeing things big, really big, after the cockroaches implant binocular lenses into his eyes.

episodes.name: Oggy goes Snailing
episodes.overview: Oggy found a poor snail and kept it as a pet and bought a lot of snails he enjoy. However, he is about to be in for one slippery ride...

episodes.name: Happy Campers
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack go camping and, after a number of mishaps, starting with Dee Dee eating a plant that causes hallucinations to the user, upset a wild boar who follows them home.

episodes.name: The Outsider
episodes.overview: A mouse makes his way into Oggy's household, taking whatever he wants, namely food and shelter. Unfortunately, Oggy has a fear of mice and the cockroaches aren't getting on well with this uninvited guest.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: The good news: Oggy is having a birthday party, and Jack's invited (he stacks champagne glasses for the party). The weird news: the cockroaches are also invited, and up to no good again, as usual. Even worse, Oggy develops suicidal tendencies later on following an unintentional accident (which Jack triggered), forcing Jack to try and protect him for as long as he can, even if it means taking the lumps himself.

episodes.name: Missing in Action
episodes.overview: A jog in the park with Jack goes wrong for Oggy when he trips over, causing him to try and catch up. However, as always, the cockroaches are around to make matters worse for the blue feline.

episodes.name: Ski Bugs
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are hoping to relax at a ski resort. However, the cockroaches once again follow them, and trick Oggy into sledding down a dangerous slope. Can Jack save him?

episodes.name: Fame & Glory
episodes.overview: Oggy really want to go to the circus but had no money so Jack made a circus for himself, including the people and, unfortunately for the 2 felines, the cockroaches.

episodes.name: Hip Hip Hip Hypnoses
episodes.overview: Marky learns to do hypnosis and want to hypnotize Oggy for anything.

episodes.name: All Out of Shape
episodes.overview: While Oggy was playing and using his limitless imagination with clay, the cockroaches uses a clay Oggy as a voodoo doll to literally shape Oggy's life into a wreck in all the ways possible.

episodes.name: Roachy Redneck
episodes.overview: The cockroaches have a redneck cockroach visitor (their father) and can make plants come to life which Oggy is enjoying... until he gets overconfident.

episodes.name: Love & Kisses
episodes.overview: Oggy's sister, Monica comes over for a visit, whereas Jack is in love and tries to be a thrillseeker like her. However, love and kisses won't be for long, as the Cockroaches try their best to ruin it.

episodes.name: Milk Diet
episodes.overview: Dee Dee wins a cow in a lottery.In prize he brings the cow to Oggy's house. Now for profits,the three got a bull.But it backfires on both of them.

episodes.name: The Techno-files
episodes.overview: Jack decides to help Oggy by showing him his inventions, purely designed for cockroach removal - which is, in fact, overcomplex and technologically advanced versions of the flyswatter.

episodes.name: Wash Day
episodes.overview: The cockroaches, in an attempt to give Dee Dee a bath, turn the entire suburban region into an ocean, and Oggy's just woken up to that. Can our blue feline make it back into the house, or will the cockroaches dampen any more of his plans?

episodes.name: Saturday Black Fever
episodes.overview: Oggy strikes oil whislt doing a spot of gardening. Through this, he can earn a BIG profit, which brings attention to the cockroaches.

episodes.name: Crazy Shopping
episodes.overview: Oggy arrives at the supermart, and the cockroaches have tagged along. Soon, their never-ending quabble results in Oggy knocking down a huge pile of detergent. Oggy is kicked out by the security guard and is forced to disguise himself in order to enter the shop and complete his errands.

episodes.name: Perpetual Motion
episodes.overview: While repairing a broken remote Jack accidentally creates a device that can control time. Chaos breaks out while he tries out this new toy, and things does not get better when the cockroaches get ahold of the item.

episodes.name: Sleepless Night
episodes.overview: Oggy returns home after a night out with Jack and only wants to go to sleep but the cockroaches have other ideas.

episodes.name: Saving Private Dee Dee
episodes.overview: Oggy, being sick and tired of having his vegetable patch invaded by the cockroaches, decides to protect his vegetables with an electric barbed wire fence. However, cockroach Dee Dee is trapped in the patch, and is soon adopted as a child by a hedgehog. Can Dee Dee's fellow roaches help him break out?

episodes.name: Life's a Beach
episodes.overview: Jack made the backyard a beach for everyone to do whatever they had in mind, but all Oggy gets is nothing but disaster from the customers, and needs all the urgent help he can get - even if it means from the cockroaches in person.

episodes.name: Laughing Gas
episodes.overview: Jack's latest device at eliminating the cockroaches from the house ends up in the wrong hands when they manage to get Oggy to drink it. What's more, they're armed with some real wacky laughing gas as well.

episodes.name: Walls have Ears
episodes.overview: On a rainy day, Oggy and Jack are watching TV when a thunderstorm damages the antenna. Oggy is sent to repair it, but a thunder hits him as well and he falls into muddy water full of snails, which makes him able to trespass walls.

episodes.name: Hit the Road Oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy plans on going caravanning but the cockroaches continually ruin it for him. Don't miss the last few seconds of the cartoon.

episodes.name: Face Off
episodes.overview: When Oggy gets himself - and his original face - anviled by another prank the cockroaches made, Jack decides to take him to the plastic surgery to fix the problem. Unfortunately, misunderstanding and cockroach intervention will lead to severe and literral defacing - and it will be pretty ugly, too.

episodes.name: Penguin Pandemonium
episodes.overview: Oggy and cockroach Dee Dee wake up to find their fridge-freezer occupied by a penguin and its egg. It's (quite) obvious what this hostile occupation by a polar bird leads to...

episodes.name: Penalty Shot
episodes.overview: After watching a game of soccer on TV, cockroach Joey introduces it to Dee Dee and Marky, and decide to have their own game. However, they soon learn that finding the perfect pitch is no walk in the park.

episodes.name: That's the Last Straw!
episodes.overview: When all else fails for Oggy to eliminate the cockroaches once and for all, then there is always one last resort... this time, the cockroaches attempt to fool Oggy into thinking there's a meteor coming.

episodes.name: Going Up
episodes.overview: The stairs at Oggy's house are too long, and is difficult for him to climb them up when chasing the cockroaches. So, he buys an elevator for making it easier to go to the second floor. But soon, cockroaches make everything go out of control.

episodes.name: Copy Cat
episodes.overview: When the cockroaches break the ear of one of Oggy's most precious figurines, he gets so frustrated and heart-broken that he simply sits still in the sofa, holding the rest of the broken ear in his hand. The cockroaches decide to build a robot to take Oggy's place in chasing them - a decision they will come and live to regret.

episodes.name: High Flyers
episodes.overview: Dee Dee and Joey have decided they want to fly and Marky is the test subject in a number of very unsuccessful attempts.

episodes.name: The Wonder Whistle
episodes.overview: Oggy receives a time-freezing whistle in the mail (along with some ear muffs). But when the cockroaches take notice of this, they trick him into thinking that he has frozen them in time. And upon doing so, they steal the whistle while Oggy's asleep and cause mayhem in the city.

episodes.name: The Hungry Ostrich Empire
episodes.overview: Oggy is left to look after an ostrich for Jack. While it starts eating anything around the house, the cockroaches get involved with the ostrich chase. Dee Dee and Marky want to eat it, whereas Joey wants to ride it.

episodes.name: Lost in Space
episodes.overview: Oggy is on the duty of looking after a space station. However, the cockroaches have come aboard to cause the usual mischief, this time in the deep, dark, inky depths of the final frontier.

episodes.name: Working Cat
episodes.overview: With electricity bills and economic shortage (lack of food and money), Oggy decides to take up a job test in order to look for work. One of the few episodes where the cockroaches support him.

episodes.name: Beware of the Bodyguard
episodes.overview: The cockroaches are causing the usual trouble, again. Oggy is sick and tired of them bullying him all the time (at least more than he usually is), so he decides to get... a bodyguard.

episodes.name: Go for it, Jack
episodes.overview: Oggy wanted to play table tennis but Jack got busy trying to impress Oggy’s sister. The three cockroaches Joey, Marky and Dee Dee tried their best to ruin Jack’s attempts but Jack ended up conquering his love. Very romantic indeed.

episodes.name: Soldier for a Day
episodes.overview: Oggy is drafted into the Army, given the fact that he is fit for service, and the cockroaches decide to come along and cause havoc in the Boot Camp.

episodes.name: Do Not Lean out of the Window
episodes.overview: Oggy's taking a train home, apparently - until the cockroaches decide to give him their own brand of handling the railways.

episodes.name: The Joker Joked
episodes.overview: Oggy prepares to meet up with his date, and her parents. However, a mix-up in the mail results in Oggy wearing the wrong attire: a magician's suit.

episodes.name: 7 Minutes & Counting
episodes.overview: After Oggy is bitten by a poisonous snake, Jack has to take care of him. However, the cockroaches try to prevent him from doing so, as well as allowing the poison inside of Oggy to kick in.

episodes.name: Un-Bear-able Bears
episodes.overview: Carneval time! Oggy and Jack decide to dress up in different costumes. But the costumes soon causes a serious misunderstanding not only between the cats, but between two bears as well.

episodes.name: Warning! Boa on the Run
episodes.overview: Upon returning from a picnic to the zoo with Jack, Oggy finds a Boa Constrictor in his picnic basket. In the process, it consumes almost everything in the house, namely Jack and the Cockroaches. Can this large reptile be taken back to the zoo before it gets indigestion?

episodes.name: Hide and Sick
episodes.overview: Oggy is having a sick day recently - and the Cockroaches are out to take advantage of his current situation all the while Jack is trying to cure Oggy from his illness, resulting in a hide-and-seek game of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Mayday Mayday!
episodes.overview: Oggy's cruise trip is rudely interrupted by cockroach Dee Dee while Jack, Marky and Joey are feeling... seasick.

episodes.name: Green Peace
episodes.overview: Oggy attempts to get a pine tree ready in time for Christmas, despite a dispute involving his inner-angel and inner-demon. To add insult to injury (or was it the other way around?), his inner-demon joins forces with the cockroaches and attempt to destroy all of the trees Oggy prepares for Christmas Time.

episodes.name: My Beautiful Prison
episodes.overview: Oggy is given a treasure map by the cockroaches. However, in order to get this 'treasure,' Oggy must break INTO a maximum security prison. The result... an all-out Prison siege.

episodes.name: Mission To Earth
episodes.overview: Oggy and Joey unwittingly catapult themselves to another planet. They later see a spaceship leading toward the invasion of Earth from aliens disguised as garden gnomes. The directive is clear and the imperative is obvious now: terminate the gnome aliens' invasion permanently and get back to Earth at once.

episodes.name: Jack-In-A-Box
episodes.overview: Jack shows Oggy a machine that can transform objects into other things (i.e. transforming a cow into dairy products). But when the cockroaches throw Jack into the machine, Oggy makes his attempt to save him - even if it costs him his sane physical form.

episodes.name: The Blob
episodes.overview: After Oggy receives a lava lamp-like object from the post, the cockroaches release the blob from inside of it, which then starts growing and eating anything in its path.

episodes.name: Barbecue
episodes.overview: Oggy is enjoying a barbecue in his garden and Jack is unsuccessfully trying to fly a kite. When he (Jack) gets wrapped in the line the cockroaches are using for their tennis ball, he starts a mayhem. The mayhem soon escalates and involves them all, including Bob and the Hawk living in Oggy's tree.

episodes.name: Off Limits
episodes.overview: The cockroaches move into Bob's home, taking Oggy's TV, fridge and money with them. After reasoning fails him, Oggy tries to win back his key possessions by force.

episodes.name: Golf Curse
episodes.overview: Jack believes he is a good golfer but his caddy, Oggy, knows he isn't. Both suffer from attacks from the targets of Jack's wild swings.

episodes.name: Up To No Good
episodes.overview: While having a roast chicken cooked, Oggy finds a switch in his garden, which unveils a mountain from underneath his house. Unfortunately, the cockroaches have already made it into the house, awaiting his meal. Can Oggy make it back in, even with an encounter from a disco-dancing yeti?

episodes.name: Don't Rock the Cradle
episodes.overview: Oggy is left to look after the baby of Jack and Monica while they were far away, which is, however, easier said than done, as the cockroaches are all hellbent on making this babysitting job a challenge.

episodes.name: The Pied Bagpiper
episodes.overview: Oggy encounters the Loch Ness Monster in his swimming pool. Whilst he tries all his best to look after it, the cockroaches want to get rid of it by all means, at all costs - even if it means their physical health.

episodes.name: Magic Carpet Ride
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a new carpet, which turns out to be a magic carpet, able to fly. When the cockroaches tie explosives to it, it goes out of control and Jack must save Oggy, who can't control the carpet.

episodes.name: Safari so good
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are on safari on Africa. Dee Dee is there too, and is trying to ruin the trip. After monkeys steal their safari truck, Oggy and Jack must devise several ways to try to escape from the African wilderness.

episodes.name: Strike!
episodes.overview: The cockroaches' game of pick-up sticks is interrupted by Oggy, who is bowling. However, when Jack comes over, a chase begins, leading both cats to a real bowling alley.

episodes.name: A Tooth for a Tooth
episodes.overview: The cockroaches are pulling yet another prank on poor Oggy. This time, they put massive, fake teeth in his mouth. Oggy is forced to call his old friend Jack in order to get rid of his new, oversized teeth.

episodes.name: What A Dump
episodes.overview: Oggy's latest attempt at removing the cockroaches results in them (including our blue feline) taking a one way ticket to the rubbish tip. Can Oggy break out of the junkyard in one piece, especially with the cockroaches?

episodes.name: Baby Boum
episodes.overview: The stork is coming and, of course, he also brings babies. Oggy decides to dump a baby in Bob's garden. As the storks continue to bring babies, this results in an all-out infant battle between Oggy and Bob where both are trying different methods of dumping the babies in the opponent's garden.

episodes.name: Black and White
episodes.overview: Oggy is trying a new, super-strong detergent. The cockroaches decide to fill the washing machine to the brim with it as Oggy exits the laundry room. This causes the washing machine to over-flow and cover Oggy's house with pink foam. When a rain cloud washed it off, the house (and the garden) has lost all its colour. This has quite a depressive effect on both Oggy and the cockroaches.

episodes.name: Sky Diving
episodes.overview: Just as Jack was about to propose marriage to her, a thrill-seeking Monica decides to take up skydiving, taking both Jack and Oggy with her. However, Dee Dee has come along too, just to make the stunt harder for an already scared Jack.

episodes.name: Brainchild
episodes.overview: Oggy trips over a small, fat kid sitting on the street and typing with a laptop. The kid then decides to follow Oggy home. Oggy tries (but to no avail) to call Jack for advice. But while he does, the unusually intelligent kid starts performing strange experiments on the cockroaches. Soon, Oggy must call the FBAÏ (Federal Bureau of Analgesics Ïo) for help.

episodes.name: Welcome To Paris
episodes.overview: Oggy's trip in Paris goes horribly awry when the cockroaches, somehow, hitch a ride. The chase starts at the Eiffel Tower and goes all the way to Notre Dame de Paris.

episodes.name: Boxing Fever
episodes.overview: After the cockroaches pranks result in another encounter between Oggy and Bob, this time Oggy challenges Bob to a duel with Bob forcing on Oggy a boxing duel. Oggy calls Jack in order to get some help in training for the upcoming match - will Oggy get out of this fisticuff, or is it TKO for him?

episodes.name: Chatter Box
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a new type of crackers that causes anyone who eats one to speak non-stop in gibberish. Dee Dee tries one out and gains the ability to speak. However, the other cockroaches are not very impressed by Dee Dee's new verbal skills (and no one else by the way), until Jack also eats one of the crackers.

episodes.name: Sitcom
episodes.overview: After seeing Oggy watch a TV sitcom, the cockroaches play a clever prank on him, which involves a tape recording of laughter. And if that's not enough, the recording ends up in Oggy's mouth while Jack and Monica are near to breaking up.

episodes.name: Paper Chase
episodes.overview: Another series of cockroach pranks results in Oggy falling into a photocopier, and trapped inside a piece of paper. Can Oggy find a way out of this situation?

episodes.name: Oggy's Puzzled
episodes.overview: Oggy's attempt at finishing a jigsaw puzzle starts to go to pieces when cockroach Joey steals the final piece.

episodes.name: Control Freak
episodes.overview: Jack and Oggy are having a racing contest in order to decide who should be allowed to use the TV's remote-control – something that only results in more mayhem.

episodes.name: Flower Power
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a book on flower power and decides to become a peaceful hippy. The cockroaches try to provoke him into losing his temper.

episodes.name: Sea Risks
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are left stranded in the middle of the ocean on a lifeboat following a shipwreck. Jack tries to find a way out while Oggy can only think about one thing, and one only: food

episodes.name: Upside Down
episodes.overview: A terribly windy day leads to Oggy nailing all appliances and furniture to the floor. However, the house itself gets blown away, landing upside down on top of a tree. Oggy tries to cope with a world gone upside down, but the cockroaches, again, make things hard.

episodes.name: Oggy Has Kittens
episodes.overview: Oggy adopts a kitten after it faces torment from the cockroaches. What's more, he's willing to teach this infant the proper cat etiquette, much to the confusion of Jack.

episodes.name: Keep Cool
episodes.overview: Once again, the cockroaches have raided Oggy's fridge in the middle of the night, but this time, they leave the fridge door open, causing the whole world to go into a second ice age. How can Oggy and Jack cope?

episodes.name: Pharonuf
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack's trip in Egypt takes the usual twist when the cockroaches show up to cause mayhem. However, the chase takes themselves and Oggy into a time vortex (inside a pyramid), leading to the Ancient Egyptian Empire time period, where our blue feline is suddenly taken into slave labour, whereas the roaches are all treated like Emperors. What's more, an ancient mummy awaits those who dare disturb its rest.

episodes.name: Oggy's Bag
episodes.overview: Oggy chases the cockroaches into his dirty laundry bag. However, they soon find out that this bag's a world of its own, and the clothes come to life.

episodes.name: Homebreaker
episodes.overview: After his home gets reduced all the way down to ruins, Bob moves into Oggy's house for a stay while his house is being rebuilt. Just how would they react with this situation, only time will tell

episodes.name: Joey and The Magic Bean
episodes.overview: One night a green giant comes to Oggy's neighborhood and Joey meets with him. He gives Joey a can of magic beans, which make Joey grow taller when he eats them. Joey spends all night trying to grow up enough to scare Oggy. But no matter how huge he grows, whenever he confronts Oggy, he is still shorter.

episodes.name: The Pumpkin that Pretended to be a Ferrari
episodes.overview: In this fairytale-like story, Oggy accidentally runs over a frog whilst returning home from his shopping. He then tries to kiss it better, only to learn that this frog is actually a fairy, who decides to make a van out of his shopping bag. When Jack learns of Oggy's situation, he decides to find another frog/fairy in order to have a big night out.

episodes.name: Take Cover
episodes.overview: Jack's love for playing toy soldiers turns into a nightmare when the cockroaches fool him into believing that there's a real war going on in the back yard.

episodes.name: Octopus
episodes.overview: Oggy befriends an octopus which the cockroaches want to eat. Little does Oggy know this octopus makes a habit of plotting robberies - for example, when Oggy was at his most unaware when he sleeps and gets relaxed, the Octopus sniggers and pulls Oggy's stuff into his head.

episodes.name: Sheepcat
episodes.overview: Oggy has a new job shaving sheep. For him, even here, the cockroaches are there, ready to get Oggy in trouble - for the shear love of it.

episodes.name: Night Watchmen
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are assigned to keep watch over a toxic waste plant, briefed to make sure no monkey business will make this plant go nuclear. But while Jack is sleeping on the job, Oggy has to take damage from the cockroaches, trying his best to avoid sending the entire waste plant sky-high.

episodes.name: Abandoned Cockroaches
episodes.overview: When Oggy and Jack go on vacation yet again, the cockroaches tag along, then the cruel cats plan on leaving them behind at a convenience store which only destroys their car.

episodes.name: V.I.P. Party
episodes.overview: Our favorite feline is invited to a extravagant V.I.P. party. As always (if you're familiar with Oggy), the cockroaches come along and turn this party up one notch too high as Oggy suffers torture by Marky and Dee Dee, while Joey has eyes for Cinderella and her only.

episodes.name: Scuba Diving
episodes.overview: When our not so deliberate duo, Oggy and Jack, take up scuba diving in Hawaii during their vacation, not even water can stop the cockroaches from tagging along and taking the plunge to cause their usual mischief - this time under the great blue.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Magic Shoes
episodes.overview: While walking home, Oggy finds a pair of magic shoes that can dance on their own whenever spit-shined. Oggy soon becomes famous with the toe tappers. All goes well until the cockroaches ruin everything.

episodes.name: Casino
episodes.overview: Oggy receives his 1 million Euro payment. Jack spends it all on a casino joint. And of course, the cockroaches come along for the ride.

episodes.name: Santa Oggy
episodes.overview: Right in the middle of this Christmas night, Santa Claus, while doing his routine gift delivery services, experiences - and gets disabled by - cockroach-related technical difficulties, so Oggy volunteers to do his job for him. Too bad the cockroaches are trying to take the "merry" out of Oggy's merry Christmas tonight - festive anything-goes style.

episodes.name: Just Married!
episodes.overview: The big day has arrived when Oggy gets invited to the marriage of his best friend, Jack, and a French poodle, promising to be cockroach-free, but Dee Dee, Marky and Joey come along for the wedding too, uninvited, just to raise a little heck... well, so much for that "No Cockroaches Allowed" policy of the invitation.

episodes.name: Living Carrots
episodes.overview: One day, Oggy discovers that all of the vegetables in his house are alive! So naturally, the vegetables are saved. But when Oggy gets hungry, they may have to resort to change Oggy into a predator.

episodes.name: Castaway Cats
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack fall overboard on their cruise ship and fall on an island. While Oggy is enjoying himself, Jack is trying to leave. Meanwhile, the cockroaches are being kidnapped by a roach eater.

episodes.name: Transamazon-ians
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are on a wild safari. They run into friendly insectivore natives who accidentally make Jack unconscious which the cockroaches take advantage of.

episodes.name: First Flight
episodes.overview: Jack is preparing an airplane flight, while Oggy gets on the wrong flight and the cockroaches are the pilots.

episodes.name: Invincible
episodes.overview: After being run over by a car, Oggy discovers he has superpowers, and Jack becomes his sidekick in order to protect the world from villainy. However, both cats always get into trouble.

episodes.name: Inside Out
episodes.overview: A witch drops a strange invention - an enchanted telescope, namely - in Oggy's house. When the cockroaches use it, they grow to gigantic size - and of course manage to shrink Oggy, Bob and Jack.

episodes.name: Priceless Roaches
episodes.overview: Oggy is in China and the cockroaches are there also causing mischief. With that, Oggy sells them to a Chinese merchant but then starts to think he made the wrong decision.

episodes.name: The World Underneath
episodes.overview: The cockroaches' latest prank on Oggy is trapping him under the house, Jack hears of it and makes the cockroaches go down to save him. However, Jack must first sign the contract that if the cockroaches save Oggy, they will humiliate Jack by recording him dancing like a ballerina.

episodes.name: Golden Eggs
episodes.overview: While doing laundry, Oggy discovers of a chicken that can lay eggs... but not just any egg - golden ones. When the cockroaches learn of this, they try to get one of her eggs too for profits.

episodes.name: Termite-ator
episodes.overview: The cockroaches hire a termite to help them get in the cupboards. However, this termite causes problems with Oggy and Jack.

episodes.name: The Mini-Golf War
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are playing mini golf in Oggy's yard. The cockroaches show up to cause trouble for Jack, while Oggy keeps getting a pefect score.

episodes.name: Oggywood
episodes.overview: Oggy is exploring scenic Hollywood, and the cockroaches try to bug him. The chase leads them to several movie scene parodies.

episodes.name: Horse Ride
episodes.overview: Jack brings Oggy a horse for a horse show. Oggy plans on getting famous for riding it but becomes only a show the cockroaches can enjoy.

episodes.name: Oggy's Crab
episodes.overview: Oggy adopts a crab knowing that it keeps the cockroaches away, However, the crab soon gets a bit... clingy to Oggy much to his dismay.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: After catching him in the fridge, Oggy manages to kill cockroach Dee Dee, but he did not realize that Dee Dee was just playing dead. Also, Joey and Marky calls the police and a crime inspector to make this even worse for Oggy.

episodes.name: The Ancestor
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a past form of a cockroach frozen in his garden. The kind cockroaches unfreeze him, later finding out the really, really hard way that what cockroach they've thawed is a wild cat eater - which equals Oggy is bound to end up becoming the main item in a prehistoric cave-bug's menu.

episodes.name: Surf's On
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are out surfing but Oggy is stuck with the big board. Plus, after he manages to control it, the cockroaches make things worse for him and Jack.

episodes.name: Hold Up
episodes.overview: Oggy must protect the banks' money, but the cockroaches steal his forklift, and Oggy has to get it back once and for all!

episodes.name: Fancy-a-Pizza
episodes.overview: Jack opens up a pizza delivering business and Oggy is the deliverer. But Oggy's job becomes difficult once the cockroaches steal Oggy's every order.

episodes.name: Oggy's grandma
episodes.overview: Oggy's grandmother returns which means bad news to the cockroaches. Considering, Oggy's grandmother drinks a power coffee, making her super strong against them.

episodes.name: Locked Outside
episodes.overview: The cockroaches lock poor Oggy out of his house. Now Oggy must find a way back in before his house is trashed.

episodes.name: Cartoon Lesson
episodes.overview: While watching a bunch of old cartoons, Oggy and the cockroaches are transported in the projector. Oggy then finds the characters who want to teach him a little something about cartoons.

episodes.name: Ugly, Dirty and Good
episodes.overview: Cockroach Joey is hit on the head and treats Oggy like a role model. Now Marky and Dee Dee must try to change him back.

episodes.name: Moving Out
episodes.overview: Oggy is up to his breaking point with the cockroaches so he moves to the city. Feeling sad and lonely, the cockroaches try to look for him - but when they show up in his new apartment room, something tells the city there's not enough room for the both of them.

episodes.name: Deep Trouble
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack climb aboard on a submarine, but the cockroaches come along and take over the entire ship.

episodes.name: The Cicada and the Cockroach
episodes.overview: Kindhearted Oggy takes in a cicada hoping to use her sound for relaxation, not realizing it gives Joey a headache.

episodes.name: Oggy's Double
episodes.overview: Oggy finds another cat that is a near-perfect replica of himself (save for a white spot on his tail). When Jack learns of this, he decides to play a cruel joke on the cockroaches making them think that Oggy is everywhere, resulting in double the trouble, double the laughs.(There's a deleted scene in this episode. When Joey finds out that Oggy follows him in space, there's a part that his head exploded. But since it was deleted due to censorship, the result is the scene when he cries.)

episodes.name: To Serve and Protect
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack attend Bob's police training camp, and the cockroaches sabotage Jack's every task and then somehow made Oggy win.

episodes.name: Formula 1
episodes.overview: Jack invites Oggy to see him participate as an F1 racer in the big Formula 1 tournament being hosted at the circuit arena. But when the cockroaches come with the cats to get their race on, havoc-wreaking bug style, things are about to go way too turbo for Oggy and Jack to stomach.

episodes.name: Olivia
episodes.overview:
When a new girl cat named Olivia moves into Oggy's neighborhood, he instantly falls in love with her. But, not only are Bob and Jack (who are working together) also pining for Olivia, when the cockroaches see the whole thing, they pull out all the tricks they can to throw a wrench into this relationship.

(NOTE: This episode was released together with the 13th anniversary of the show.)

episodes.name: The Lighthouse Keeper
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack become lighthouse keepers for the day. While Jack gets a fear of heights, Oggy once again chases Marky and Joey, who have the book, while Dee Dee is directing boats all over the place.

episodes.name: Dump the Roaches!
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack find a new job − Oggy and a sleep deprived Jack become garbage men. But the worst has just come as the cockroaches mess up the controls and things go crazy.

episodes.name: Dee Dee's Diet
episodes.overview: Dee Dee thinks he is too fat so he decides to go on a diet.

episodes.name: A Jealous Guy
episodes.overview: During a lovely day in the yard, Joey photoshops some pics and makes Oggy believe that he has had a fling with Olivia, the lovely neighbor. Oggy turns jealous and begins to act very strangely. No one can understand why.

episodes.name: Let's Party, Guys!
episodes.overview: It's Joey's birthday. And Marky and Dee Dee decide to throw a surprise party. The two post an invitation on the internet and hundreds of roaches show up the next day.

episodes.name: Airship House
episodes.overview: After Oggy gets everything ready for Jack's birthday party, things go airborne as the roaches blow up all the hot air balloons with helium and release them in the attic, eventually making the house fly into the city.

episodes.name: Panic Room
episodes.overview: Exasperated at being once again, victim to the roaches' practical jokes, Oggy orders a mysterious kit. When the kit arrives, it turns out to be an airtight, hermetically sealed CCTV room where he can close himself up and then, with help from a console, activate various traps he has set all over the house.

episodes.name: Into the Wild
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack go hiking on the GR 20 trail across the island of Corsica... so do the roaches. They sabotage Jack's compass and the two cats get lost in the wild, which turns out to be pretty frightening.

episodes.name: Washing Day
episodes.overview: Oggy has just washed his clothes, and is about to dry them, when the cockroaches come up and steal the clothes, starting a battle between them on the clotheslines.

episodes.name: Lightning Visit
episodes.overview: Oggy's relatives arrive at Oggy's house for a visit. As such, Oggy is determined protect his visitors from the roaches' plots, or else the visit will turn into a historical disaster.

episodes.name: Oggy's Shadow
episodes.overview: The roaches have trapped Oggy with lights and nailed his shadow as they are about to, as usual, raid the fridge. When Oggy breaks free, his shadow is still trapped and then becomes stray. Will Oggy be able to get his shadow back?

episodes.name: Buddy Parrot
episodes.overview: One day, Oggy finds a parrot which repeats anything he says and does, and decides to take it home. As the parrot is at Oggy's house, Dee Dee becomes very obsessed with the parrot, and wants to get its feathers only for... food?

episodes.name: The Magic Pen
episodes.overview: A pencil with a magical drawing ability has just fallen onto Oggy's house yard, and the cockroaches plan to use it against Oggy.

episodes.name: The Cube
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a weird cube on his yard, and decides to take it to his living room, not knowing the cube soon causes trouble for his friends as it grows bigger until it entrances him.

episodes.name: A Charming Guy
episodes.overview: Oggy has problems expressing his feelings for Olivia. To make matters worse, the roaches come along to ruin Oggy's every attempt to impress Olivia.

episodes.name: Fly for Fun
episodes.overview: When a helicopter lands on Oggy's yard, Oggy deicdes to take control of it for a while. Suddenly, Joey falls in love with the helicopter, thinking it's a giant female dragonfly and leaving the other roaches in confusion... and harder for Oggy to control it.

episodes.name: Olivia's Pimple
episodes.overview: Olivia notices a pimple on her face and refuses to leave her home. What will Oggy do to help Olivia get rid of the pimple?

episodes.name: The Ice Rink
episodes.overview: It's an icy day, and when Bob crashes into a fire hydrant, Oggy's yard turns into a large ice rink. Oggy and Olivia decide to have some fun on the rink by going skating.

episodes.name: For Real
episodes.overview: After being electrocuted, Oggy and Joey turn into a realistic cat and a realistic roach. Nobody recognizes them, not even Jack nor Marky nor Dee Dee.

episodes.name: Fly to the Sun
episodes.overview: Following an explosion provoked by the roaches, the house and everyone inside find themselves in outer space and heading straight for the sun!

episodes.name: Run, Olivia, Run
episodes.overview: Olivia is taking part of a marathon, and Oggy comes with a bag with a bottle of water inside. However, the roaches, as usual, also come with him and are up to no good, stealing the bag, resulting in a big chase while the race is on.

episodes.name: Mind the Giant
episodes.overview: Marky eats some tree seeds which make him grow really, really big, turning him into a giant roach who wants more and more food.

episodes.name: A Soft World
episodes.overview: Oggy gets a package containing a spray bottle, which he hopes to be able to kill the roaches. However, as the roaches have it in their hands, they have made everything droopy and soft.

episodes.name: Sport Fans
episodes.overview: After the cockroaches destroy Oggy's TV, Oggy and Jack make the cockroaches do Olympic events themselves.

episodes.name: The Kitchen Boy
episodes.overview: Oggy gets a new job as an apprentice cook in a chic, modern restaurant. Bob is his boss. All is good until the cockroaches come along and try to sabotage Oggy's work.

episodes.name: Mister Cat
episodes.overview: Oggy is taking part of a Mister Cat contest, but then Bob also enters with his new pet cat. When it comes to the first round, Bob decides to ask help from the cockroaches to fix the contest to make sure his pet cat wins.

episodes.name: The Easter Egg
episodes.overview: An Easter Bell accidentally drops an Easter egg in Oggy's yard. Oggy finds it and decides to use it to impress Olivia. The cockroaches want it too, and they want to eat it.

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
episodes.overview: After the cockroaches steal Oggy's nose, Joey and Oggy fall to the center of the earth. Meanwhile, Dee Dee and Marky tell Olivia of this, and they go down to save their friends.

episodes.name: Butterfly Race
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a butterfly and teaches it tricks. Jealous, Bob dresses Marky up as a butterfly and the two compete in a race. Olivia makes a butterfly race, the winner will get a trophy and honey. Who will win?

episodes.name: Oggy Goes Green
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a solar panel, and sees its effects. Then, Oggy goes crazy and uses everything from solar energy. Soon the cockroaches decide to use them as a weapon to chase Oggy with burning heat.

episodes.name: Now You See Me, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Oggy is fixing himself up a veggie drink, so what could be more healthy than that? But when his back is turned, the roaches put some junk into the blender. When Oggy drinks it, the taste is as gross as dirt! And while he is cleaning dishes, he suddenly becomes invisible - an unintended but intriguing side effect.

episodes.name: What a Lousy Day
episodes.overview: Oggy starts scratching his head and lends his comb to Jack who lends it to Bob and the three of them start scratching their heads. Olivia sees this and tries to clean their hair. When all else fails, call in the cockroaches...

episodes.name: Jack's Nephew
episodes.overview: Jack brings his nephew to Oggy's house, wanting Oggy to look after him. But Jack's nephew is lazy, and only wants to eat cereal flakes for breakfast. Even worse, he also makes friends with Joey, and they both start to trash the place.

episodes.name: Roommate Wanted
episodes.overview: Oggy is getting mighty bored living all alone. As he vacuums the spare room, he suddenly has an idea: get a roommate!

episodes.name: The Bathtub Race
episodes.overview: When everyone around the neighborhood is bored, Olivia decides to have a bathtub race. Oggy, Jack, and Bob sign up with their customized bathtubs while the cockroaches join in using Oggy's toilet bowl.

episodes.name: Inspector Dee Dee
episodes.overview: Oggy has returned to his house and shocked to find every thing gone in his house which makes him upset. With the police useless (literally), Dee Dee decides to find the culprit.

episodes.name: Hep Taxi
episodes.overview: Oggy becomes a taxi driver, and the roaches try to sabotage the business.

episodes.name: (Un)happy Camper!
episodes.overview: Olivia and Oggy head off in their camping car for a beach vacation. The roaches come along for the ride and decide to ruin Oggy's vacation of course. Also, Bob comes along caravanning near Oggy and Olivia's the next day, making Oggy (and Olivia) very disturbed by Bob's furniture. Can Oggy save his camping trip?

episodes.name: A Streetcar on the Loose
episodes.overview: Jack has become the driver of a new streetcar that runs through the neighborhood. Olivia also brings some kids to ride the streetcar. The cockroaches slip into the machine and raise heck. Even worse, this makes Bob crushed by Jack's streetcar several times. Can Oggy stabilize the high-speed situation while Jack is asleep?

episodes.name: Grease-Monkey Oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack opened up a garage with gas tanks and lets Oggy worked as a mechanic while he relaxes.Oggy has to fix Bob's car while the cockroaches make havoc.

episodes.name: Farmer for a Day
episodes.overview: Olivia takes Oggy to an old farm.Oggy starts having an unusual experience with the animals, but with the cockroaches it's only the beginning.

episodes.name: Oggy Splits Hairs
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack open up a salon. But the cockroaches are here to mess up the work.

episodes.name: Little tom oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy exits shopping and confused to see which way to go. He tries to leave a trail but Dee Dee eats it and both of them became lost. Can they get home to their friends?

episodes.name: Don't barge in
episodes.overview: Oggy and Olivia are on a boat ride and the cockroaches are there too except Oggy kicked them out. Bob is the bridge operator signaling Oggy to stop except Oggy is confused with Bob's signals and ended up bumping into him. The cockroaches raced back to the boat while Bob always ended up getting bumped by Oggy's ride. The cockroaches managed to go to the controls and slams into dam bridges and ended in Oggy's house. Bob goes to kill Oggy with a shotgun but Oggy pushed the button and Bob got crushed by the gate.

episodes.name: Artsy Oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy is painting a portrait of his tree in his yard. Suddenly, the cockroaches snatch his painting and doodled all over it. After Oggy gets it back from Joey, he calls an art critic and gives Oggy a briefcase full of money. Surprised, Oggy paints more portraits but when the critic arrives again, he refuses to accept Oggy's painting. Later Oggy forces the roaches to doodle all over his portraits and when the critic arrives once more, he gives Oggy bars of gold. The roaches confess what really happened. Feeling angry, Oggy grabs the roaches and hangs them in frames.

episodes.name: A five-legged sheep
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a five-legged sheep in front of his yard, little does he know that it is astray. Oggy decides to keep it for a while and also the roaches have come along for the ride. The mayhem ruins Bob's yard. Later, the sheep's owner finally finds it and brings it home back to where it belongs. Meanwhile, Bob confronts Oggy and drags him to the garage and beating him up.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Magic Smile
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a magic smile from the magic shop. Everytime he wears it, he turns into a muscular tough guy. Will he use it to impress Olivia or plot revenge against the roaches? Both of these don't happen until cockroach Joey gets a hold of the magic smile. How will Oggy get it back?

episodes.name: Water Sports
episodes.overview: Oggy, Jack and Olivia go to Aqualand for the day. The roaches wreak havoc by fiddling around with the wave-making machine and cranking it to max.

episodes.name: Caviar on the House!
episodes.overview: Oggy decides to buy some caviar to impress Olivia. Unfortunately, he only has enough money to buy one little fish egg!

episodes.name: Party Pooper
episodes.overview: Oggy decides to throw a private party just for Olivia so as to try and seduce her. But the roaches hack into Oggy's printer and print up three more invitations to the party. So Jack and Bob join in the fun.

episodes.name: Scaredy-Cat
episodes.overview: It's Halloween! While Oggy is busy sculpting a pumpkin to put in the window, Jack is trying on his most horrible costumes. What's worse, a swamp monster came in Oggy's house by mistake and got lost

episodes.name: North-Pole Panic
episodes.overview: This year's Christmas would have been the best one in the lifetime if it hadn't been ruined by the cockroaches.

episodes.name: Skate fever
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a skateboard in the street. After a disastrous start, he begins to get the hang of it and really enjoy it. He even builds a skate park at home.

episodes.name: Dream On!
episodes.overview: Oggy is having a nightmare, can he solve this little sleeping problem? In the end, Oggy is angrily ruin his dream by cockroaches and he chase around his house with chainsaw to rupture the roaches. Meanwhile, Olivia, Bob and Jack are do nothing to stop his sleeping problem.

episodes.name: Lady K
episodes.overview: Oggy goes over to Olivia’s for tea. The roaches manage to invite themselves and start to make a mess of Olivia’s house. While the roaches are walking through the air vents, they meet a magnificent roach babe: Lady K…

episodes.name: Oggy and the Dodo Bird
episodes.overview: Oggy adopts a bird and Dee Dee decides to eat it.

episodes.name: Steamed Out
episodes.overview: Oggy, Jack and Bob built a den. However, the cockroaches puts on steams in the house.

episodes.name: Picnic panic
episodes.overview: Oggy, Jack and Olivia are going for a picnic and the roaches came along too. However, the ants flock the roaches out by attacking them after the lovely picnic.

episodes.name: Lights out
episodes.overview: Oggy, Jack, Bob and Olivia are playing a game of cards when suddenly Joey accidentally turn off the lights and starts to raid the fridge.

episodes.name: Wrestling Time!
episodes.overview: Jack coerces Oggy into being a wrestler.

episodes.name: Shoplifting
episodes.overview: The cockroaches are trying to get some food by stealing.

episodes.name: Bicycle Crazy!
episodes.overview: A big bicycle race will be passing through the neighborhood. Jack plans to get money from the spectators by making a barbecue stand, only to get distracted by what Bob is planning to do. Meanwhile, Marky wants to meet Eddy, a bicycle racer, and get a photo of him.

episodes.name: Teleportation
episodes.overview: Oggy ordered a teleport machine which he uses it to go to any place faster by teleporting to that location. While Oggy is asleep, the cockroaches uses that to rob the fridge but Dee Dee and Marky are trapped while Joey's asleep. Jack and Bob wanted to try that machine but unfortunately after a few teleportations, they became stuck together so Oggy has to get them free.

episodes.name: Oggy & the Flour Man
episodes.overview: Oggy is about to make a pastry delight until Dee Dee steals his flour and Oggy chases after it. After that, the flour becomes a flour man and Oggy befriends it, while Dee Dee and his pals are trying to get the flour from the flour man, but it won't be easy because they can easily get through it instead of touching it, and easily blown away.

episodes.name: The Cucaracha
episodes.overview: A mexican cockroach came for a visit with the cockroaches until Joey became jealous when Lady K fell in love with the cucaracha.

episodes.name: High-Rise Nightmare
episodes.overview: Bob has built a modern skyscraper and moves in the penthouse. Bob now thinks he can do what ever he wants. He throws his garbage out the window and Oggy's garden quickly becomes a garbage dump! Oggy declares war against Bob…

episodes.name: The Abominable Snow Roach
episodes.overview: A heavy snowstorm covers the whole area and the whole place is soon under a heavy pile of snow. The cockroaches are making a snow roach and they want to eat food but Dee Dee has already eaten all the food in the fridge. So when they spot Oggy carrying food, they decide to disguise themselves as a snow roach and let Oggy give them food.

episodes.name: Very Special Deliveries
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack take up jobs as delivery cats with Bob as their boss and the cockroaches as their saboteurs.

episodes.name: Back to the Past (Featuring Olivia)
episodes.overview: A witch is flying through the sky on her broomstick when her hat blows off and disappears in the clouds. She turns back and goes after it. The hat lands in Oggy’s yard…

episodes.name: Wake up, my Lovely
episodes.overview: Lady K wanted to rule the house of Olivia, she had a evil plan, making the apple to a forever sleeping potion, Olivia ate it. Oggy had to rescue her.

episodes.name: From mumbai with love
episodes.overview: Jack got three tickets to the Mumbai Chricket World Cup 2012, however, Joey only went there to steal the princess' precious diamond. The cockroaches stole the three tickets and going on their way on their plans.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Mermaid
episodes.overview: Oggy went scuba diving and saw a mermaid, the cockroaches kidnapped it, leaving Oggy to rescue her.

episodes.name: Oggy is getting married! (Featuring Olivia)
episodes.overview: Oggy is in Venice with Olivia, the perfect setting for a marriage proposal. Jack is there too… and the roaches, of course…

episodes.name: The Great Pyramid Mystery
episodes.overview: Oggy chases the cockroaches across the great pyramid construction site, trying to get his sandwich back. In the wink of an eye, the blue cat and his scurrilous companions get lost inside the immense pyramid... Will they ever find their way out?

episodes.name: Oggy and the Grasshopper Cloud
episodes.overview: Joey fools around with Oggy's bird-caller whistle, and attracts a cloud of grasshoppers, who invade the pyramid. The Grasshopper Leader does a deal with Joey, and ousts Pharaoh Bob. Dee Dee and Marky feel left out, and join forces with Oggy to get rid of the invaders.

episodes.name: Oggy on the Nile!
episodes.overview: Oggy invites Olivia for a dream cruise on the Nile. The cockroaches, furious at being denied access on board, decide to ruin the outing. Plagued with sea-sickness, Oggy does his best to stay afloat!

episodes.name: Gladiator Oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy and Olivia go to the Coliseum to watch a gladiator combat. The roaches filch Oggy's popcorn. He goes after them but ends up being enlisted as a gladiator! The roaches, propelled into the arena themselves, bitterly regret nicking Oggy's popcorn...

episodes.name: Shift that Chariot Oggy!
episodes.overview: When Oggy sees Olivia set off to Rome on Bob's chariot, he's miserable. How can he compete? He doesn't know how to drive those things! Jack gives him chariot driving lessons, which become a nightmare when the roaches get involved.

episodes.name: Oggy's Special Spa
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a great job working in the Roman Baths. Today, a celebrity is expected: Julius Caesar! Unfortunately, the cockroaches want to use the luxury spa too. Oggy freaks out: if Caesar sees those roaches, he can say goodbye to his new job!

episodes.name: RodeOggy
episodes.overview: Jack wants to participate in a rodeo contest organized by Buffalo Bill. Joey also wants the first prize. He is also registering. Jack then leaves the contest and asks Oggy to replace him. Who will win? Joey or Oggy?

episodes.name: Sheriff Oggy
episodes.overview: Sheriff Jack is about to take a nap and designates Oggy as sheriff. Oggy accepts, to impress Olivia, but things get out of hand. Can he protect the bank when the roaches hold it up again and again?

episodes.name: Wanted
episodes.overview: The cockroaches stick Oggy's photo over a poster: 'WANTED - BOB'. A bounty hunter turns up in search of Oggy.

episodes.name: The Green Thumb
episodes.overview: Bob, head gardener in the Versailles Palace, gives Oggy a list of jobs to make the gardens beautiful! Everything goes well, until Oggy inadvertently flattens the cockroaches, who decide to get even...

episodes.name: Oggy, the King's Coachman
episodes.overview: Oggy, employed as the King's coachman, must prepare the royal carriage and drive it to Versailles for the King's outing. On the way, Oggy comes across highwaymen... it's the roaches of course!

episodes.name: The Levee of the King
episodes.overview: Oggy helps Jack, the King's page because the sovereign must be prepared in all his finery before the Royal Portrait painter turns up. It's a nightmare with the roaches around...

episodes.name: Marky's Tournament
episodes.overview: Jack competes in a medieval tournament, with Oggy as his groom. Marky falls in love with Bob's daughter and decides to compete. All's fair in love and war – that's what cockroaches say.

episodes.name: The Roaches Seize the Castle
episodes.overview: Lord Bob goes hunting, leaving Oggy and Jack in charge of the castle. The cockroaches boot them out. Will Oggy and Jack succeed in getting back inside, before the roaches wreak utter havoc?

episodes.name: The Hunchback from the Cathedral
episodes.overview: Due to a bizarre meteorological phenomenon, the sun shines on Oggy's house but everywhere else, it's raining cats and dogs. Jack decides to take advantage of the situation and turn the house into a Club.

episodes.name: A Gorilla in Town
episodes.overview: An American adventurer brings a gorilla to the city but Joey wants to steal the ape and make his own fortune. Infuriated by the roaches, the gorilla breaks loose – and kidnaps Olivia.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Tramp
episodes.overview: It's New York 1930, and Olivia is selling flowers on the street. Joey steals them for Lady K, and has Oggy arrested instead of him. But Oggy meets Chaplin in prison and they escape, with a plan.

episodes.name: Dee Dee Capone
episodes.overview: During prohibition, Dee Dee is designated by Joey and Marky to get hold of canned food. But Oggy exposes Dee Dee and stops his business which has people starving all over the city.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Treasure
episodes.overview: Oggy is cabin boy on Jack the Pirate's ship. While searching for treasure, they meet (and sink) Bob's ship. and kidnap Olivia. A mad chase ensues over Treasure Island as roaches and cats race to find gold.

episodes.name: The Octopus Masters
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a magic medallion in a shipwreck graveyard and gives it to Olivia. When she puts it on, an Octopus appears, to obey her every wish. Now the cockroaches want it too.

episodes.name: The Precious Panda
episodes.overview: The little Emperor of China is a nightmare. But the Little Emperor adores Oggy – who is appointed to take care of him. Oggy tries to sneak off, but the cockroaches stop him.

episodes.name: Fragile Goods!
episodes.overview: Oggy is entrusted with an honorable task – restoring the Emperor's precious Ming vase. But the cockroaches are obsessed with the idea that the vase would be filled with rice. Can Oggy find a way to protect the vase?

episodes.name: Baby Sitting for the Emperor
episodes.overview: The little Emperor of China is a nightmare. His tutor, Bob, is at his wits' end. But the Little Emperor adores Oggy – who is appointed to take care of him. Oggy tries to sneak off, but the cockroaches – overjoyed to be in the Imperial Palace – block his way.

episodes.name: The Tiger Hunt
episodes.overview: Oggy, mahout of maharajah Chadabad-Abad leads his master and his servant Jack to the tiger hunt. But the roaches covet the diamond adorning the turban of the maharajah. While the tiger prowls, they do everything to seize the jewel.

episodes.name: Oggy the Fakir
episodes.overview: Oggy yearns to meet Olivia, the Maharajah's daughter, but he's denied entrance to the palace. So he tries to climb a rope mid-air, by playing the flute.

episodes.name: Cockroaches Play Cricket
episodes.overview: The Maharajah is bored and asks Jack to find an activity to entertain him. Thanks to a chaotic intervention by Oggy and the cockroaches, he invents a new game which amuses the sovereign: cricket.

episodes.name: Oggy's Dragon
episodes.overview: Oggy collects and hides a baby dragon that Bob wanted to capture. Oggy attaches himself to his dragon and tries to teach him how to fly. Roaches set their sights on it because they dream of a good fire lit in express by the dragon.

episodes.name: Beware the Longship
episodes.overview: When the Viking leader decides to mount an expedition to find a more climate-friendly land, Oggy volunteers: the explorer will be appointed governor of the colony. But the roaches expect to arrive before Oggy and fly on his beautiful longship.

episodes.name: Oggy, The Lord of Lightning
episodes.overview: When the Viking Chief launches an expedition to search for a milder climate, Oggy volunteers. Now the cockroaches are determined to get there before Oggy and steal his long ship.

episodes.name: Oggy's 1001 Nights
episodes.overview: Oggy is a carpet cleaner in Baghdad. Olivia comes to choose a carpet in the shop and is kidnapped by Bob, the vizier. With the help of Aladdin, his flying carpet, and a certain genius, Oggy flies to the rescue of Olivia, this beautiful stranger.

episodes.name: A Touch of Genius
episodes.overview: Oggy works in Jack's carpet store and the cockroaches are looking for a flying carpet. While looking around, Oggy and the roaches find a genie instead.

episodes.name: Moonshot Movie
episodes.overview: During 1900 in Paris, Oggy and Jack hunt the cockroaches hiding in the revolutionary film studio of Georges Méliès. In a film set, they all board aboard a cardboard rocket. The problem – the rocket actually takes off and brings them to the moon, while Jack is filming the adventure.

episodes.name: Lead Wings
episodes.overview: Charles Lindbergh starts his nonstop flight from New York crossing the Atlantic Ocean. But he has a couple of stowaways on board: Oggy and the cockroaches. Jack tries to rescue his cousin using a rowboat to chase the plane. A chaotic journey begins.

episodes.name: Oggy's Invention
episodes.overview: It's 1700 and the cockroaches steal the pressure cooker Jack just purchased. During the ensuing chase, the cooker lands on a cart and inspires Oggy with an idea for the first steam powered vehicle.

episodes.name: In the Glare of the Sun
episodes.overview: In Machu Picchu, Joey uses a machine that creates artificial darkness and apparently controls the sun god. He becomes the leader of the village – a true tyrant. Can Oggy trick the cockroaches and push Joey off the throne?

episodes.name: Gold Fever
episodes.overview: In Machu Pichu, Oggy is appointed to watch over the temple offerings. The cockroaches team up with a crazy conquistador who helps them to get rid of Oggy and steal the offerings. He gets the temple’s golden statue in exchange.

episodes.name: Sacrificial Special
episodes.overview: Bob, an Incan priest, is looking for a ritual sacrifice. Oggy distracts Bob from choosing his beloved llama and lets him have the roaches instead, who are attracted to the priest's necklace.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom
episodes.overview: Oggy joins Cousteau's expedition on the Calypso, but he drops a ring in the water – the one he'd planned on giving Olivia. So the cockroaches plunge overboard to fish it up.

episodes.name: Mission Apolloggy
