episodes.overview: Oggy gets lost in a car near Cape Canaveral, Joey bites his road map and leads him into the space rocket, then Marky and Dedede, standing in the checkpoint, inadvertently takes off the rocket. Who of the four will walk first on the moon?.

episodes.name: The Race to the North Pole
episodes.overview: April 1909. Jack aims to be the first one to reach the North Pole. Oggy is on his team, of course. But they have rivals: Joey wants to be first to walk on the arctic ice-fields. A crazy race ensues.

episodes.name: Jackoromeo and Bobette
episodes.overview: In Venice, Gondolier Jack falls in love with Bobette, the Doge's daughter. But dog and cat couples aren't tolerated in the Renaissance. Everyone wants to end to their romantic idyll, except Oggy.

episodes.name: Masquerade
episodes.overview: Oggy is a master in the art of making confetti in Venice. The doge orders him to release the confetti for his costume party. By emptying his supply of confetti, Oggy destroys the paradise of cockroaches, who intend to make him pay.

episodes.name: Marky Da Vinci
episodes.overview: Venice 1500 – Oggy is a failed painter unlike Marky who is a true genius at everything, artist as well as an inventor. Marky is going to invent revolutionary machines to allow Joey and Dee Dee to steal Oggy's spaghetti.

episodes.name: Emperor for a Day
episodes.overview: During the Napoleonic Wars, Oggy is a cleaner in the French army. Napoleon asks Oggy to replace him, so that he can honour a lover's tryst and the cockroaches do everything they can to unmask Oggy.

episodes.name: My Kingdom for a Teddy
episodes.overview: Oggy solves the mystery of Napoleon's famous pose: the Emperor is hiding his precious cuddly toy. Napoleon is rather ashamed, and orders Oggy to keep quiet and watch over his toy during battle.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Hieroglyphs
episodes.overview: During the Egyptian campaign, Oggy, Napoleon's aide-de-camp, meets Champollion who enlists him for his archaeological excavations. At the corner of a chase with the roaches, Oggy discovers the Rosetta Stone. But Joey wants to grab it.

episodes.name: On the High-Yurt-Way
episodes.overview: Jack and Oggy are holding an auto-youth area. Olivia is holding the cafeteria. Bob, a camel-trucker, points to Oggy's demands as he watches his cargo and flirts with Olivia. Oggy is jealous but cockroaches are interested in Bob's convoy.

episodes.name: Xanadu Milk
episodes.overview: Oggy and Olivia run a rest area in Mongolia, where the roaches create a shortage in goat's milk. So Oggy and Olivia follow Marco Polo all the way to Xanadu to find a yak.

episodes.name: The Yak Festival
episodes.overview: It is Yak Festival at the auto-youth area. Assisted by Oggy, Olivia participates as the best trainer, with the small yak of his cafeteria. Bob, winner last year, puts his title in play, while the cockroaches also plan to participate.

episodes.name: Housework in Orbit
episodes.overview: Oggy, a hygiene technician, does his best to keep everything spotless.However his boss, Bob, detects that cleanliness is only 99.97% complete.

episodes.name: The Cockroaches' Awakening
episodes.overview: Oggy has the mission of terra-forming a frozen planet, assigned to him by Bob. Aboard his ship, Oggy thaws the cockroaches, who were trapped in ice. The cockroaches decide to mess with Oggy's mission.

episodes.name: The Intruder from Space
episodes.overview: Bob sends Oggy and Olivia to investigate a planet and a spaceship. Dee Dee steals an egg, and takes it home, intending to eat it. However, the egg hatches into an alien, who steals Dee Dee's eyes.

episodes.name: The First Samurai
episodes.overview: When Jack the samurai's hand is disabled, he forces Oggy to be the substitute but Oggy failed and Olivia despite being skilled in battle was rejected due to being female and can only take the role of a geisha. Olivia decides to switch places with Oggy to make things easier.

episodes.name: Oggy-Sumo
episodes.overview: When Oggy is in conflict with Bob, Olivia suggests that the duo should settle with a sumo match to which Oggy has a disadvantage against the big dog.

episodes.name: Oggy Manga Star
episodes.overview: Bored with his life, Oggy compensates by drawing manga, but is forced to hide them from the emperor to which the cockroaches uses that to cause trouble for Oggy.

episodes.name: Color Conflict
episodes.overview: During the Stone Age, Oggy and Jack uses cave paintings as part of a plan to capture a Mammoth for dinner. However, the cockroaches are gonna mess the plans up.

episodes.name: Wheeling and Dealing
episodes.overview: Oggy Maggon has made friends with the Stone Age’s first invention, the Wheel.

episodes.name: The Big Move
episodes.overview: Prehistoric Oggy and Jack are trying to find a new home after a mistap burned down their old one.

episodes.name: The Incredible Four
episodes.overview: Dee Dee makes a false move with the microwave and Oggy, Jack, Olivia and Bob find themselves endowed with super powers. Can the cockroaches compete with adversaries like this?

episodes.name: Metalman
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a special suit so he can FLY when chasing those cockroaches. Soon he ends up flying everywhere, in service to the town. Oggy’s super hero status annoys the three pests and encourages jealousy.

episodes.name: Z Men to the Rescue
episodes.overview: The three diabolical cockroaches escape from jail. The Z-men – Olivia, Jack and Oggy – move into action. Their boss Bob sends them out to neutralise the nasties. But the roaches relish their new-found freedom. No way are they going back behind bars.

episodes.name: Mythologgy
episodes.overview: While chasing each other, Oggy and the cockroaches find themselves in the Olympian Gods Palace.

episodes.name: Oggy’s 12 Labors
episodes.overview: In the Gods Palace, Athena insists that Zeus and Hades do their share of housework. But Zeus is wily and hands his tasks to Oggy and the cockroaches. Now cat and cockroaches have to collaborate.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Minotaur
episodes.overview: Due to a mishap, an angry Zeus sends Olivia and Cockroach Dee Dee into the maze, leaving Oggy, Joey, and Marky on a mission to rescue them before the Minotaur gets them.

episodes.name: The Pig Curse
episodes.overview: Circe is in love with Oggyseus, and makes a love potion to keep him on her island. Whoever tries to stop her from succeeding will be changed into a pig.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Short-Sighted Cyclops
episodes.overview: Oggyseus disturbs Poseidon who wakes up in a fury and triggers a storm. Oggy's ship ends up on the Cyclops' Island, and the crew is in a terrible state. Will Oggyseus and friends manage to escape?

episodes.name: Oggy and the Misty Mermaids
episodes.overview: The cockroaches sabotage the compass. The result? Oggyseus’ ship goes off course, and sails straight into the Mermaids’ waters. Joey does a deal with the mermaids to get rid of Oggyseus and his crew. However, when the little mermaid sings her enchanted song, it hypnotizes Jack, Olivia, and Cockroach Marky, so Oggyseus, Joey, and Dee Dee must rescue the trio before the mermaids plan to eat them.

episodes.name: Bananas of Wrath
episodes.overview: 1150, Khmer Kingdom. King Surya Aman II orders Jack and Oggy to build him a temple (the future Angkor Wat). But Oggy is Jack’s one and only worker.

episodes.name: The Jungle Child
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a lost boy in the street. He leaves Jack to babysit while he goes in search of the parents. Jack takes the child for a walk but the cockroaches have plans.

episodes.name: The Statues’ Awakening
episodes.overview: The cockroaches have taken over Oggy’s house, occupying his bed, shower, and kitchen.

episodes.name: Below My Tree
episodes.overview: After a blow from Oggy’s swatter, the cockroaches want to get even by cutting down the one and only baobab in the village thus crushing Oggy.

episodes.name: Head in the Clouds
episodes.overview: Oggy has a wondrous power: whenever he sings in his village, he causes rain, providing villagers with water. But Joey ties his vocal cords in a knot

episodes.name: Super Temor
episodes.overview: The cockroaches are driving Oggy crazy. He goes to a witch-doctor for help, a curse specialist, who bestows him with a genie called “Super Temor”. This creature deals with the cockroaches in a flash, but lingers on with Oggy, behaving in an over-zealous way.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Legend of Excalibur
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a sword stuck in a rock but he can't remove it. Merlin appears and makes an announcement: he who can remove it will be King. Merlin appoints the cat to oversee operations.

episodes.name: Oggy and the Search for the Grail
episodes.overview: The Knights have gathered in the castle with Arthur when Merlin appears. He tells them he has had a vision.

episodes.name: Morgan the Fairy
episodes.overview: Merlin and the Knights of the Round Table get a visit from Arthur's sister, Morgan, who is not best of friends with Merlin. Can Oggy cope with his new responsibilities as Assistant Wizard?

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Try as he might, there's no rest for Oggy. The blue cat travels to Egypt, gets some fancy new jobs and even takes an unplanned trip to the moon.

episodes.name: Crackdown on the Fridge
episodes.overview: Coming back from the market, Oggy finds his house ransacked by the cockroaches: it's a total dump. He decides to protect his fridge against the cockroach attacks and clamps on a solid lock. A remastering of "Mission Oggy".

episodes.name: Laughter Forbidden
episodes.overview: The roaches force Oggy to swallow an explosive concoction that Jack invented to get rid of the roaches. Jack tries everything in the books to stop Oggy, the walking time bomb, from going off. A remastering of "Laughing Gas".

episodes.name: Cockroach vs. Mouse
episodes.overview: A mouse makes his way into Oggy's household, taking whatever he wants, namely food and shelter. Oggy has a fear of mice and even the cockroaches aren't getting on well with this uninvited guest. A remastering of "The Outsider".

episodes.name: Strong Coffee
episodes.overview: Oggy wakes up, depressed and yawning. The house looks like it's been blitzed. After a cup of coffee he decides to get this place in order. The roaches are more than willing to lend a hand. A remastering of "Shake Oggy Shake".

episodes.name: Jack's Kit
episodes.overview: Jack arrives with a put-it-together-yourself roach-catching trap. When he tries to get some silence to work, the cockroaches try their best in causing as much noise as possible. This forces poor Oggy to try and keep them quiet, which is easier said than done. A remastering of "Cat Kit".

episodes.name: Cute Little Puppy
episodes.overview: Oggy comes across an adorable dog who’s lost his way. Moved by the young pup’s moist eyes, he immediately takes him in. Everything would be fine if Jack didn’t surprise Oggy barking and immediately called for psychiatric help. A remastering of "A Dog Day Afternoon".

episodes.name: The Great Invasion
episodes.overview: Jack is tired of the weak, useless toxins in the insecticide, so he decides to enhance it by using his new chemistry set. The result is a gas that has the ability to clone the subject it was used on. A remastering of "Cloning Around".

episodes.name: Tooth Exchange
episodes.overview: After witnessing Oggy receive money from the Little Mouse, Joey is determined to get some coins too, even if it means losing all of his teeth. A remastering of "Tooth Good to be True".

episodes.name: Oggy's Costume
episodes.overview: The cockroaches play a hit-and-run prank where they frame Oggy by dressing up as him and attacking Jack. A remastering of "Oggy's Clone".

episodes.name: Mamma Oggy
episodes.overview: The Cockroaches prank Oggy by inflating his stomach, making him think that he's pregnant. A remastering of "Nine Months and Counting".

episodes.name: Oggy and the Kittens
episodes.overview: Jack chases for the cockroaches but Oggy supports them once and for all, so the cockroaches are thrown out. Just a few seconds after that they receive three young kittens. Jack yet has a doubt, can he solve the mystery? Or is there none at all? A remastering of "Oggy and the Babies".

episodes.name: The Winning Ticket
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack win the lottery ticket number for a massive sum of money, that is, until Dee Dee gets a hold of it. A remastering of "The Lottery Ticket".

episodes.name: Super Dee Dee
episodes.overview: While repairing the roaches' TV in one stormy night, Dee Dee is struck by lightning, which gives him super strength. However, Dee Dee lets this get to his head, causing him to be a villain toward Oggy and even his fellow roaches, Marky and Joey. A remastering of "Oggy vs. Super Roach".

episodes.name: Alone at Last
episodes.overview: Oggy finally manages to remove the cockroaches out of his home permanently, but gradually regrets doing so, as he starts to miss them, leading to a severe tantrum. A remastering of "So Lonely".

episodes.name: Snack Time
episodes.overview: Poor Oggy, as usual, gets in an accident involving Jack against the cockroaches in retaliation of his cake being eaten, ending up being squashed into a disk. To make sure he'll never repeat that mistake twice, Jack builds a time machine to go back in time and prevent the accident. For him, turning forward – and back – the clock may yield unwanted results. A remastering of "The Time Machine".

episodes.name: Doll Idol
episodes.overview: Having completely regressed, Oggy enthusiastically plays with his doll. He puts it in a pretty little doll house, without suspecting for a second that the cockroaches have already squatted the place. A remastering of "Baby Doll".

episodes.name: Ups and Downs
episodes.overview: Oggy's house is ripped off the ground by a violent gust of wind. It lands on the top of a tree, but upside down. Oggy has to nail down all the furniture so it doesn't come crashing down on his head. A remastering of "Upside Down".

episodes.name: Bless You Oggy!
episodes.overview: Oggy is having a sick day recently – and the cockroaches are out to take advantage of his current situation all the while Jack is trying to cure Oggy from his illness, but everytime he tries to cure Oggy with a pair of syringes they keep on striking on Bob when Oggy sneezes. A remastering of "Hide and Sick".

episodes.name: The Loot
episodes.overview: With a conspiring wink, Jack slips his cousin a mysterious attach case bursting with greenbacks. Oggy is scared about holding such a sum of money and tries to find the ideal hiding place for it. A remastering of "Go Slow With Your Dough".

episodes.name: Roach Charmer
episodes.overview: After seeing a snake charmer on TV, Oggy decides to make his own flute, in which he steals a car part from his neighbour Bob. Upon adding holes to it, Oggy plays it and unwittingly hypnotises Marky into being a dog that would remain loyal to him, much to the dismay of Dee Dee and Joey. A remastering of "Oggy and the Magic Flute".

episodes.name: A Crazy Carpet
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a new carpet, which turns out to be a magic carpet, able to fly. When the cockroaches tie explosives to it, it goes out of control and Jack must save Oggy, who can't control the carpet. A remastering of "Magic Carpet Ride".

episodes.name: Wake-Up Oggy!
episodes.overview: Oggy heads home as the sun is rising. He has one thing in mind: Sleep. But the roaches are in tip top shape and they have just one thing in their dirty little minds: keep Oggy from sleeping. A remastering of "Sleepless Night".

episodes.name: Wild Flight
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack share a ride in a remote-controlled hot-air balloon. However, it soon becomes a joyride when their remote ends up in the cockroaches' hands. A remastering of "Loony Balloons".

episodes.name: Bouncing Ball
episodes.overview: Oggy buys a ball that starts bouncing off all the walls, smashing everything and ends in an open-mouthed Joey who swallows it. Now the chase is really on. A remastering of "Bugball".

episodes.name: Cockroach Oggy
episodes.overview: Having swallowed a dubious pill concocted by the roaches, Oggy transforms into a giant cockroach. Wild-eyed and completely distraught at first, little by little Oggy gets used to his new appearance. A remastering of "Metamorphosis".

episodes.name: An Intrusive Neighbor
episodes.overview: After his home gets blown up all the way down to ruins, Bob moves into Oggy's house for a stay while his house is being rebuilt. Just how would Oggy and the cockroaches react with this situation? Only time will tell. A remastering of "Homebreaker".

episodes.name: Serenade for a Monster
episodes.overview: Oggy does a beautiful swan dive into his pool and hits his head on a sea monster. His panic quickly dissipates when he realizes that it's just old Nessie, the Lock [sic] Ness monster. Oggy will charm the big guy with a bagpipe and leads him back home. A remastering of "The Pied Bagpiper".

episodes.name: A Shockproof Denture
episodes.overview: The cockroaches are pulling yet another prank on poor Oggy. This time, they superglue massive, fake teeth in his mouth. Oggy is forced to first try to call his neighbor Bob, but he instead puts the big teeth out to beat up Oggy and then he puts them back in, which causes Oggy to call his old friend Jack in order to get rid of his new, oversized teeth. A remastering of "A Tooth for a Tooth".

episodes.name: A Rebel Bait
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are going fishing. Oggy has gathered all the necessary material, including an enormous worm who escapes from the jar and threatens Oggy with a revolver. "Rambo-worm" blows up Jack’s trailer, steals his car and… goes fishing. A remastering of "The Bait Bites Back".

episodes.name: A Wild Train Ride
episodes.overview: Jack is completely immersed in his video game. To get his cousin’s attention, Oggy takes out his old electric train, but Jack doesn’t even lift an eyelash! The cockroaches take advantage of their good luck to hijack the train and steal all the food! A remastering of "One Track Life".

episodes.name: Bad Luck Day
episodes.overview: It's Friday the 13th and Oggy has broken his mirror. A guaranteed seven years of bad luck. Catastrophes are drawn to Oggy, orchestrated from the shadows by our three little beasts. A remastering of "Wrong Side of the Bed".

episodes.name: Oggy Cat Trainer
episodes.overview: Oggy rescues a kitten who was being tormented by the cockroaches then teaches him proper cat lessons but that only makes Jack a bit confused. A remastering of "Oggy Has Kittens".

episodes.name: The Tenants
episodes.overview: Oggy flattens the cockroaches with a well-deserved swat of the flyswatter. The three insects are thrown out without further ado. Humiliated, they can think of only one thing : get their revenge! They decide to put Oggy’s house up “for rent”! A remastering of "House for Rent".

episodes.name: Chocolate Wars
episodes.overview: Oggy orders a box of chocolates but that turns into a battle when the cockroaches try to steal it from his hands. A remastering of "Bitter Chocolate".

episodes.name: Nature's Call
episodes.overview: Oggy rushes over to the little boy's room but the door is locked from the inside. The cockroaches are basking in a refreshing bath. It's out of the question that someone's going to bother them. A remastering of "Occupied".

episodes.name: Flying Lesson
episodes.overview: Dee Dee and Joey have decided they want to fly and Marky is the test subject in a number of very unsuccessful attempts. A remastering of "High Flyers".

episodes.name: Crazy Driving!
episodes.overview: Oggy takes his driving test and the least one can say is that he’s not really gifted! The cockroaches, of course, are along for the ride, and take it upon themselves to transform the driving test into a real stock-car race… A remastering of "A Tip for the Road".

episodes.name: Puzzle Mania
episodes.overview: Oggy is putting the last piece of his complicated jigsaw puzzle into place when the roaches steal it from him. With Jack and Oggy on their tail, the roaches wreak havoc as they run through the house. A remastering of "Oggy's Puzzled".

episodes.name: Special Deliveries
episodes.overview: A stork keeps delivering babies into Oggy's garden. Oggy discreetly drops them off at Bob's who in turn discreetly gives them back to Oggy. A remastering of "Baby Boum".

episodes.name: Under the Sun
episodes.overview: It’s a beautiful summer day. Oggy savors this moment of pure joy. But suddenly a small cloud projects a shadow directly onto Oggy. A remastering of "Heatwave".

episodes.name: Abracadabra
episodes.overview: In this remastering version, Oggy bought a ring for Olivia and goes to her place hoping to win her love and her parents acceptance. Unfortunately for him, due to a mix up with the mail packages, he ends up with a magician suit and things didn't go too well for Oggy. A remastering of "The Joker Joked".

episodes.name: A Voracious Pet
episodes.overview: Jack brings a female Ostrich to Oggy's place but things didn't go to well when the ostrich begins devouring Oggy's furniture. The cockroaches get involved in this predicament, Dee Dee and Marky are planning to eat the ostrich but their leader Joey wants to ride her instead. A remastering of "The Hungry Ostrich Empire".

episodes.name: TV Addict
episodes.overview: Oggy is hypnotised by his favourite TV programs. The roaches take advantage of this to start up the practical jokes. But nothing and nobody are going to get in the way of Oggy's TV. A remastering of "TV Obsession".

episodes.name: Sweet Teddy-Bear
episodes.overview: While his parents are hibernating, a little bear cub leaves the family den. His curiosity leads him to Oggy's house where the latter is getting ready for a costume party. Jack is dressed up as a bear and Oggy as a baby whose teddy bear looks too real. A remastering of "Un-Bear-able Bears".

episodes.name: Oggy Robot
episodes.overview: During a chaotic chase, the roaches shatter one of Oggy's crystal, animal sculptures. Oggy is so depressed that he doesn't even respond to the roaches' nasty attacks. A remastering of "Copy Cat".

episodes.name: Christmas Spirit
episodes.overview: There's a snow storm raging on Christmas eve. Oggy throws the roaches out into the bitter cold so that he can continue decorating the Christmas tree in peace. A remastering of "A Truce for Christmas".

episodes.name: A Crazy Week-End
episodes.overview: Jack decides to take Oggy to the seaside for the weekend. Oggy is ecstatic and jumps into the car with his ducky life preserver. But hiding in the shadows of the car are three pesky little stowaways. Yes you guessed right, the three roaches. A remastering of "Blue Sunday".

episodes.name: The Challenge
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are having a disagreement to see which show they watch until Jack gets an idea: A 10-Lap Motorcycle Race around Oggy's house and the one who wins gets the remote. The cockroaches on the other hand get involved with the race betting to see which of the 2 cats win but Joey puts most of the bets on Jack while Dee Dee and Marky bet on Oggy. A remastering of "Control Freak".

episodes.name: Soccer Fever
episodes.overview: Jack is glued to a soccer game on TV. Drawn by the screaming soccer fans, Joey takes an interest in the game and with his two partners and a few buddies he forms two teams and organizes a match. But they need a soccer field. A remastering of "Penalty Shot".

episodes.name: Lost at Sea
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are shipwrecked, floating in the middle of the ocean on a little raft. Dee-Dee gobbles up their last cookie reserve. The two cats are ready to go at each other’s throats when a ship appears on the horizon. A remastering of "Sea Risks".

episodes.name: Deep into the Wild
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are on a safari photo-shoot in Africa. A remastering of "Safari So Good".

episodes.name: Wacky Garden Party
episodes.overview: Oggy has set up his barbecue under an oak tree where a mommy eagle is tending to her eggs. A remastering of "Barbecue".

episodes.name: Bath Time!
episodes.overview: Dee Dee stinks to high heaven, so much so that even Joey and Marky can't stand the smell. His buddies decide to force him to take a bath. A remastering of "Wash Day".

episodes.name: Bowling Champions
episodes.overview: The cockroaches' game of pick-up sticks is interrupted by Oggy, who is bowling. However, when Jack comes over, a chase begins, leading both cats to a real bowling alley. A remastering of "Strike!".

episodes.name: Oggy's Sister
episodes.overview: One fine morning a blue tornado storms into the house: it's Oggy's sister! Jack immediately falls into a catatonic love stupor. When love digs in its claws, it's hard to let go and no sacrifice is too big in Jack's pursuit of the young cat-babe... A remastering of "Love and Kisses".

episodes.name: A Fit Body For Oggy
episodes.overview: Overweight Oggy decides to keep fit, much to the dismay of the cockroaches. What can they do in this situation? Perform the usual sabotages to make sure Oggy stays the way he is. A remastering of "Oggy's Diet".

episodes.name: Oggy's Brand-New Face
episodes.overview: Oggy needs to have plastic surgery after his face gets badly injured during a chase against the Cockroaches. A remastering of "Face Off".

episodes.name: Thunder Oggy
episodes.overview: As Oggy climbs up on the roof to repair his TV antennae, he is struck by lightning. Oggy pounds on the door to get in, then stops, stunned. His fist has gone right through the door without even touching it... He can now walk through walls! A remastering of "Walls Have Ears".

episodes.name: Destruction Work In Progress
episodes.overview: Jack has decided to redo the facade of Oggy's house. While he breaks for a quick snack, the cockroaches steal his tools and his trough in order to build themselves a makeshift pool. A remastering of "Beware Of Destruction".

episodes.name: A Greedy Friend
episodes.overview: After Oggy receives a lava lamp from the post, the cockroaches release the blob from inside of it, which then starts growing and eating anything in its path. A remastering of "The Blob".

episodes.name: What's On The Menu
episodes.overview: Dressed to the nines, Jack and Oggy go to dinner in the city. Of course, the three beasties tag along but when the cockroaches go crazy, someone is going to get their desserts! A remastering of "Oggy's Night Out".

episodes.name: Good Night,Don't Sleep Tight
episodes.overview: Oggy is trembling with fear but completely riveted to a horror film on TV. Of course the roaches take advantage of the situation in order to frighten him even more by pretending to be blood-thirsty monsters... A remastering of "Monster From The Mud Lagoon".

episodes.name: Beach Havoc
episodes.overview: Oggy arrives at the seaside on his scooter, ready for a nice day of laziness. But the cockroaches, who discover the joys of the Big Blue, its crafty shellfish, its short-lived sandcastles, soon transform this dream-like beach into a battle zone. A remastering of "Beachcombers".

episodes.name: Itsy Bitsy Oggy
episodes.overview: The cockroaches take off with the key to Oggy’s fridge and dash down to the center of the Earth. To flush them out of their hideout, Oggy jumps into the Xerox machine and makes himself the size of the roaches. A remastering of "It's A Small World".

episodes.name: Magic Laundry Bag
episodes.overview: Oggy and the cockroaches enter a world where laundry is alive. A remastering of "Oggy's Bag".

episodes.name: Bodyguard Oggy
episodes.overview: In order to keep the roaches at bay for good, Oggy hires a bodyguard. The gorilla is ready to engage in mortal combat with the roaches each time they get out of hand. A remastering of "Beware Of The Bodyguard".

episodes.name: Playing Dough
episodes.overview: Oggy has a new hobby: modeling clay. With the dexterity of a Rodin, Oggy sculpts a miniature version of the entire house, including himself. A remastering of "All Out Of Shape".

episodes.name: Remote Controlled
episodes.overview: The remote for the TV becomes able to affect reality. A remastering of "Perpetual Motion".

episodes.name: Locked Out
episodes.overview: Oggy has decided to put an end to the roaches' pesky behavior once and for all. He puts a solid padlock on the fridge and hides the key in his piggy-bank. A remastering of "The Piggy Bank".

episodes.name: Brain Control
episodes.overview: By chance one day, the roaches find themselves scrambling through the labyrinth of Jack's (minuscule) brain. A remastering of "It's All Under Control".

episodes.name: A Unwanted Customer
episodes.overview: Oggy is off to the supermarket to shop. But the roaches have tagged along and they sit in the shopping cart stuffing their faces with chicken at Oggy's expense. As he chases the them through the aisles, Oggy turns the supermarket upside down... A remastering of "Crazy Shopping".

episodes.name: Green Trouble
episodes.overview: While picking mushrooms with Jack, Oggy gets bit by a snake. It's countdown time as a disquieting purple spot starts spreading all over poor old Oggy's fur! Despite the traps set by the roaches on Oggy's rush back home, Jack manages to save him... A remastering of "7 Minutes And Counting".

episodes.name: Cyber-Oggy
episodes.overview: After a short circuit, Oggy and Joey have been sucked into the electrical system. Navigating from wire to wire and surfing on the Net, they discover the fascinating world of communication. A remastering of "Vitrual Voyage".

episodes.name: Whistle Power
episodes.overview: Mailman has brought Oggy a stun-whistle in order to neutralize the roaches. But the insects aren't stupid and once they've stolen the whistle they head downtown, paralyzing everything that moves. A remastering of "The Wonder Whistle".

episodes.name: The Delights Of Camping
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack go camping and, after a number of mishaps, starting with Dee Dee eating a plant that causes hallucinations to the user, they upset a wild boar who follows them home. A remastering of "Happy Campers".

episodes.name: Bad Sport
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are playing an interminable game of chess. Oggy moves one of his pawns forward and wins. A remastering of "Winner Takes All".

episodes.name: Showtime!
episodes.overview: The circus is in town. But Oggy and Jack are flat broke and can't go. Oggy's down in the dumps. To cheer Oggy up, Jack transforms the living room into a three-ring circus. Jack's roach taming number is a big hit! The roaches' revenge is imminent... A remastering of "Fame & Glory".

episodes.name: Hiccup Treatment
episodes.overview: Oggy makes himself a cup of coffee, but just when he’s about to drink he’s lifted up by a monstrous hiccup that throws the coffee right in his face. The cockroaches, dumbfounded by Oggy’s clumsiness, are convinced that he has gone completely crazy! A remastering of "The Hiccup".

episodes.name: Library Hysteria
episodes.overview: Jack tries to take his cousin with him to practice a manly and healthy sport: rock climbing. As for Oggy, he much rather prefers climbing the ladder in his library. A remastering of "It's a Long Way Down".

episodes.name: Well Guarded Gold
episodes.overview: Oggy discovers a map that indicates that a treasure is hidden right next to his house. But here's the hitch: a prison has suddenly sprung up right on the spot. A remastering of "My Beautiful Prison".

episodes.name: The Black Gold Rush
episodes.overview: In digging its toes, Oggy is oil. In the House, also, it is oil. Once he opens a tap, it's also the oil flowing in. In fact, he has the 'black hand'. His house is quickly invaded of pipelines and rigs of all kinds. It stinks and it's dripping from all but the money comes flowing in. Cockroaches also want their piece of pie, but Joey shows up a little too high roller with the pocketed 1 ticket. A remastering of "Black Saturday Fever".

episodes.name: Oggy the Babysitter
episodes.overview: Oggy is given custody of a baby by his sister and Jack. With his twisted mind, Joey immediately sees the opportunity to make a maximum of money. He decided with his accomplices to kidnap the kid for ransom to Oggy. But with the children, you have to expect everything. Far from being scared, the baby enjoys adventure and the cockroaches are the ones to suffer. A remastering of "Don't Rock the Cradle".

episodes.name: Ghost Hunting
episodes.overview: After Oggy finally manages to kill the cockroaches with a frying pan, the cockroaches' spirits come back and constantly make nightmares a reality for poor Oggy. Oggy has to do a ritual to survive the terror of the three ghosts. A remastering of "The Ghost-Hunter".

episodes.name: The Whiz Kid
episodes.overview: Oggy trips over a small, fat kid sitting on the street and typing with a laptop. The kid then decides to follow Oggy home. But there, the kid starts performing strange experiments on the cockroaches. A remastering of "Brainchild".

episodes.name: Drone Out of Control!
episodes.overview: Jack has ordered a drone and he's barely had time to try it out when the cockroaches figure out what they're going to do with it. Steal it and wreak havoc all over the neighborhood...

episodes.name: Oggy's Exoskeleton
episodes.overview: Armed with his good old fly swatter, Oggy is once again chasing the roaches. Fed up with this medieval weapon, Jack suggests that he tries out his latest invention: a roach exterminator outfit. A remastering of "The Techno-Files".

episodes.name: The Sacred Roaches
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack went to Egypt to go to the top of “The Great Pyramid of Giza” but when Joey discovers the hole on top of the pyramid, Oggy and the cockroaches fell to the hole and went to the past (when the pyramid is just building). A remastering of "Pharonuf".

episodes.name: Bleached!
episodes.overview: The roaches are doing a wash and the washing machine overflows, spreading suds throughout the house. A rain storm washes it all away and the house and its inhabitants reappear. But in black and white. A remastering of "Black & White".

episodes.name: Wild Rides at the Fair
episodes.overview: The carnival has come to town, and Oggy and Jack are more than happy to go to it. The cockroaches also decide to go to the carnival, just to have massive fun wreaking havoc all over the place. A remastering of "The Carnival's in Town".

episodes.name: Oggy's Jungle
episodes.overview: Oggy has recently bought a super fertilizer that he uses to make his plants super big. But the roaches put a firecracker in the bag, resulting in the bag exploding, showering the house with fertilizer. Now, Oggy’s house has become a jungle, and the animals all have gotten bigger as well... A remastering of "The Garden of Horrors".

episodes.name: Xmas Tree Quest
episodes.overview: Oggy’s artificial Christmas tree is in shreds. Despite a nagging conscience, Oggy decides to cut down a real Christmas tree from the forest. A remastering of "Green Peace".

episodes.name: Panic In the Air
episodes.overview: Oggy has aviophobia (fear of flying), and while taking him on a flight, Jack tries hypnosis to help him relax. However, while a relaxed Oggy has gone walkabout around the plane, the cockroaches have come aboard as well, in which they leave all of the pilots tied up and gagged in order for them to cause the usual problems. A remastering of "Rock 'n Roll Altitude".

episodes.name: Oggy's Beach Club
episodes.overview: Due to a bizarre meteorological phenomenon, the sun shines on Oggy's house but everywhere else, it's raining cats and dogs. Jack decides to take advantage of the situation and turn the house into a Club. A remastering of "Life's a Beach".

episodes.name: Oggy and the not So Smart Bracelet
episodes.overview: Olivia buys a “smart bracelet” which as far as Oggy is concerned, is becoming a little too much part of her life. Oggy looks for a way to get rid of it while Marky goes bug-eyed with wonder over the thing. Jack then introduces Oggy to a app which you can hack the bracelet to do what you want.

episodes.name: Zen Oggy
episodes.overview: Oggy finds a book on flower power and decides to become a peaceful hippy. The cockroaches try to provoke him into losing his temper, but to little avail. A remastering of "Flower-Power".

episodes.name: Oggy Snail Farmer
episodes.overview: Oggy found a poor snail and kept it as a pet and bought a lot of snails he enjoy. However, he is about to be in for one slippery ride... A remastering of "Oggy Goes Snailing".

episodes.name: Extreme Indoor Sports
episodes.overview: It's raining like crazy and Monica is bored silly. Then she has an idea: why don't she and Jack try out some indoor sports?

episodes.name: Mouse Attack
episodes.overview: As the roaches watch on with interest, Oggy constructs a remote control for his lawn mower. Right then and there the roaches decide to out-do him. A remastering of "Mouseagator".

episodes.name: The Power of Love
episodes.overview: While Oggy is getting his butt whipped by Jack in a game of Ping-Pong, his sister shows up unannounced. A remastering of "Go For It Jack!".

episodes.name: Oggy's Teddy Bear
episodes.overview: The roaches steal Oggy’s Teddy Bear and hold it hostage for food. But Oggy won’t give in. It turns out though, that his fetish teddy is a collector’s item that Bob wants desperately.

episodes.name: Guess Who in the Fridge
episodes.overview: A female penguin sets up home in Oggy's fridge and doesn't budge an inch. Jack convinces Oggy to disguise himself as a penguin in order to draw the intruder out of the fridge. A remastering of "Penguin Pandenomium".

episodes.name: The Roaches Move
episodes.overview: Tired of being chased by Oggy, the roaches decide to change the tune. A remastering of "Off Limits".

episodes.name: Freefall Jump
episodes.overview: Oggy's sister drags her brother and Jack along for a bit of parachuting. Dee-Dee who's got nothing better to do, follows them. As they get ready to jump, our two fraidy cats show their true colors. A remastering of "Sky Diving".

episodes.name: Oggy at Top Speed
episodes.overview: Jack and Oggy are racing their remote controlled cars through the house. As the race cars zoom through the house they flatten everything in their way, including the roaches. A remastering of "Race to the Finish".

episodes.name: Inside Oggy
episodes.overview: During one of the cockroaches’ many pig-out sessions, Dee Dee falls to the bottom of a strawberry yogurt without noticing that Oggy. A remastering of "Globulopolis".

episodes.name: Roach Vision
episodes.overview: Tired of hunting down the roaches, Oggy orders special glasses that can tell exactly where they are and predict all their moves. With these he can sabotage all their plans. The roaches get so depressed that they want to move out, but Joey always has Plan B...

episodes.name: Welcome To Mars
episodes.overview: In order to flatten out the roaches once and for all, Oggy buys an enormous catapult-fly swatter. Always curious, Joey tries it out and suddenly finds himself projected all the way to Mars. A Remastering Of "Mission To Earth"

episodes.name: Roach Express
episodes.overview: As Oggy gets on the train and waves farewell to Jack, the roaches take over the conductor's controls. Their antics get out of hand and they lose control of the train, which is going faster and faster. A Remastering Of "Do Not Lean Out Of The Window"

episodes.name: Oggymon Go
episodes.overview: Jack and Olivia introduce Oggy to their new obsession: hunting down virtual veggies on their smartphones and winning lots of points. The roaches build a machine to turn Oggy into a huntable character, then hack into the game site to triple the number of points you can get if you catch Oggy, obviously as a incentive for the cats to suck Oggy into their smartphones.

episodes.name: Broom Driving
episodes.overview: A witch lands at Oggy’s then disappears in order to take a snooze, her magical broom stored neatly in the kitchen. A remastering of "Oggy and the Magic Broom".

episodes.name: Oggy Learns Swim Or No't
episodes.overview: After being chased about, the cockroaches sniff a horrible odor. All eyes turn to Oggy, who must face the facts that he stinks. But taking a bath is hard for Oggy, who is hydrophobic. Jack tries to cure Oggy of his hydrophobia, while trying to hide the fact that he’s hydrophobic as well. A remastering of "Deep End".

episodes.name: Lead Me A Hand Oggy!
episodes.overview: Oggy orders a remote controlled hand, which scratches wherever you want it to. But our smart cat also uses it to attack the cockroaches. But when Oggy is asleep, the roaches attach the hand to his arm.

episodes.name: Oggy's Vacations
episodes.overview: Oggy is joyfully closing the shutters and double locking the front door. Wearing sunglasses and a straw hat, Oggy hops in his camping trailer, destination: vacation. A remastering of "Hit The Road Oggy!".

episodes.name: Dumpster Driving
episodes.overview: Oggy stuffs the roaches into a garbage bag and throws it in the dump truck. He gives them a sarcastic little wave good-bye but isn't paying attention to the back of the truck which snaps shut on him. A Remastering of "What a Dump!"

episodes.name: Oggy At The Opera
episodes.overview: An exceptional gala evening at the Opera is under way with the famous tenor Jack. But Dee Dee is a bit of a music buff himself and tonight he'd like to share the stage and the glory with Jack. A Remastering Of "A Night at the Opera".

episodes.name: Oggy Copy Cat
episodes.overview: Oggy accidentally falls into the Xerox machine. He disappears and his double, flat as a photocopy, pops out of the machine and comes to life. A Remastering Of "Paper Chase"

episodes.name: A Roachneck Cousin
episodes.overview: The roaches country cousin shows up for a visit. The little bumpkin has a real green thumb and immediately tends to all the damage his cousins have inflicted on Oggy's garden. A Remastering Of "Roachy Redneck"

episodes.name: Sharing Oggy
episodes.overview: Monica, Oggy's sister pays a family visit. She quickly understands she's got to share her brother with his girlfriend, Olivia. The two girls are polar opposites.

episodes.name: Oggy's Elevator
episodes.overview: Oggy builds an elevator in order to catch the nasty little bugs more easily. But the roaches immediately build one of their own. Oggy ups the ante and builds another one, then another, then another. A Remastering Of "Going Up"

episodes.name: Very Special Treatment
episodes.overview: After a cockroach chase that has finished badly, Oggy finds himself at the hospital. A Remastering Of "Emergency Room"

episodes.name: Oggy Cranes His Neck
episodes.overview: Oggy decides to renovate his house by building it higher. So he buys a used crane on-line. Except he has a heck of a time mastering the cranky, old machine.

episodes.name: And The Winner Is... Dee Dee
episodes.overview: Dee Dee steals money from Oggy's piggy bank and plays the lottery. He wins and heads off to pick up the big prize only to learn he's won a milking cow. A Remastering of "Milk Diet"

episodes.name: Oggy Goes To Paris
episodes.overview: Like any tourist in Paris, Oggy buys a ticket for the Folies Bergère from a sidewalk ticket-salesman and then decides to kill time until the show by going to see the Eiffel Tower. Dee Dee takes advantage of his inattention and snags his ticket...  Remastering of "Welcome To Paris"

episodes.name: Vertigo!
episodes.overview: Jack has invited Oggy to visit the construction site of his future home sweet home. But in his megalomania, Jack has found nothing better to build than a skyscraper. A Remastering of "The Rise Of The Fall

episodes.name: High Security Fridge
episodes.overview: Once again the roaches have raided the fridge. But Oggy has more than one trick up his sleeve and this time the little critters are going to be caught in a trap they can't get out of. A Remastering Of "Caught In A Trap"

episodes.name: The Golf Pro
episodes.overview: Jack takes Oggy out to play golf. Despite his complete lack of talent, he manages to sink holes-in-one right and left. Jack is beside himself with rage. The roaches who are bored decide to move the holes around in order to spice up the game... A Remastering Of "GA Remastering Of "Golf Curse"olf Curse"

episodes.name: A Carriage For Jack
episodes.overview: On his way home from shopping, Oggy unintentionally steps on a frog. He picks it up and kisses it to ask forgiveness. A Remastering of "The Pumpkin That Pretended To Be A Ferrari"

episodes.name: Alien Roaches
episodes.overview: During a raid on the kitchen, the cockroaches are surprised by extraterrestrial cockroaches. An abominable racket finally wakes up Oggy. A Remastering of "Space Roaches"

episodes.name: The Laugh Box
episodes.overview: Oggy has lately been watching old sitcoms. Joey records some of the laughter, then tags behind the cat, hitting play when our favourite feline does the slightest move. Joey then makes Oggy swallow the tape recorder, and makes it look like Oggy is laughing by a remote connected to the tape. The whole neighborhood now thinks Oggy is rude, because he laughs when he’s not supposed to. A Remastering of "Sitcom"

episodes.name: Hide And Go Whiskers!
episodes.overview: The roaches cut off Jack's whiskers so they can use them like pogo sticks. But with no whiskers, Jacks panics. Oggy tries a miracle "whisker growing lotion" but the result is going to be very weird!

episodes.name: Where's the Exit?
episodes.overview: Jack drags Oggy along for some jogging. A Remastering Of "Missing In Action"

episodes.name: Brainy Roaches
episodes.overview: Through one of the cockroaches’ latest pranks, Jack’s brain, hardly bigger than a chickpea, finds itself unceremoniously ejected from his skull. A Remastering of "Toy's R Oggy"

episodes.name: Nursing the Neighbor
episodes.overview: Bob finds himself in a full body cast after an accident caused by Oggy. To make up for it, the cat decides to look after Bob, becoming his full-time nurse.

episodes.name: Space Journey
episodes.overview: Oggy is piloting the space craft replacement for the space station that is orbiting around the earth! Once he's rid himself of his space suit. A Remastering of "Lost In Space"

episodes.name: Boxing Match
episodes.overview: In order to regain his pride (thank-you roaches!) Bob challenges Oggy to a duel. A Remastering of "Boxing Fever"

episodes.name: Freezing Cold
episodes.overview: After pillaging the fridge, the roaches forget to close the door. And the ice age returns! The ground, the walls, the garden all freeze over...and pretty soon it's the entire earth! Jack and Oggy are now living in the North Pole... Brrrrrrrrrrr! A Remastering of "Keep Cool!"

episodes.name: A Dreamy Cruise
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are on a magnificent cruise ship. While Jack, Joey and Marky are seasick to their stomachs. A Remastering of "Mayday! Mayday!"

episodes.name: Hypnotic Oggy
episodes.overview: Marky is learning hypnosis and it seems to work like crazy on Oggy! Under the spell of our evil roach, Oggy starts doing the most outrageous things all over the neighborhood. A Remastering of "Hip Hip Hip Hypnoses"

episodes.name: Life's a Zoo
episodes.overview: When Olivia goes on vacation she asks Oggy to keep her parrot. Oggy also gets Jack's turtle, and some circus animals, all under one roof. How will Oggy survive, especially with the roaches around?

episodes.name: Fishing Lesson
episodes.overview: Jack takes Oggy out to teach him how to fish. Ah nature, fresh air, the soft chirping of birds in the shade. A Remastering of "Fishing Frolic"

episodes.name: Snake and Snacks
episodes.overview: On their way back from a picnic at the zoo, Oggy and Jack discover a boa stowaway in their basket. More slippery than soap, they can't get a grip on the snake. After the roaches, it's Jack's turn to get gobbled up by the boa... A Remastering of "Warning! Boa On The Run!"

episodes.name: The Big Bad Wolf
episodes.overview: A wolf escapes from the penitentiary and is hanging out in Oggy’s neighborhood, looking for food. When he ends up swallowing Oggy and Joey, Marky and Dee Dee try to rescue them, with a little help from Olivia playing the role of little red riding hood…

episodes.name: Poor Sports
episodes.overview: When the roaches sabotage a virtual game in which Oggy and Jack get to smash cockroaches, the cats decide to face off with each other in a more traditional game.

episodes.name: The Giant Roaches
episodes.overview: Oggy sets up a pair of binoculars, but the roaches take advantage of his drowsiness to put a binocular lens underneath each eyelid. When Oggy wakes up, he bumps into giant cockroaches! A Remastering of "Oggy and the Giant Roaches"

episodes.name: The Food Dispenser
episodes.overview: To stop the roaches from eating him dry, Oggy orders a food dispenser and stores all his edibles in it. But when Oggy realises that the roaches have managed to sneak into the machine, war is declared!

episodes.name: Up, Up and Up!
episodes.overview: After having put the chicken in the stove to cook, Oggy heads off to do a bit of gardening. A Remastering of "Up To... No Good!"

episodes.name: General Jack
episodes.overview: Once again, the cockroaches have made Oggy look ridiculous. In nothing flat, the cockroaches find themselves locked up in a cage by Jack. A Remastering of "The Dictator"

episodes.name: Back To School
episodes.overview: After getting hit on the head, Oggy dreams he's back in school, with Bob playing all the adult roles. The cockroaches make Oggy the dunce of the class and it looks like he's in for a rough day.

episodes.name: Fake News
episodes.overview: When cockroaches post fake videos on the internet and pass themselves off as victims abused by Oggy, the reputation of the cat takes a shot... Jack and Oggy trick and trap cockroaches in turn to restore the truth on the web.

episodes.name: The Machine
episodes.overview: Jack has built an imposing machine that is capable of modifying, recycling or transforming just about anything. A Remastering of "Jack-In-A-Box"

episodes.name: Whose Turn To Do The Dishes?
episodes.overview: Jack has left the house in a total mess and Oggy makes him clean up. The roaches, who are living in the dirty dishes, make sure that Jack would rather play around than clean the house.

episodes.name: Blah Blah Blah
episodes.overview: Unbeknownst to him, Oggy has just bought a box of special biscuits. Whoever eats them becomes a real gossip. A Remastering of "Chatter Box"

episodes.name: Alpine Antics
episodes.overview: Oggy and Jack are getting a taste of alpine antics. While Jack is being a real show-off on his skis, Oggy is sledding with caution. A Remastering of "Ski Bugs"

episodes.name: Oggy's Got Talent!
episodes.overview: Oggy accidentally becomes an ace guitarist and the roaches sign him up for "You've got Talent!", hoping to milk his popularity. But teen-idol Oggy has a huge ego and all the whims of a pop star.

episodes.name: The Witch Hunt
episodes.overview: A irritable witch turned Oggy into mice and cockroaches into cats. The roles reverse: Oggy becomes a fugitive and discovers his house under a new dimension.... The Cockroaches! And the cockroaches are taking advantage of the situation...

episodes.name: Run for Shelter
episodes.overview: Jack is playing with his toy soldiers. Fed up with his cousin's stupid childish games, Oggy tells him he should go play outside. A Remastering of "Take Cover"
